358 * Counts or destroys and drops the bash items of all furniture that matches @ref f in the map tile
359 * @param comp NPC companion
360 * @param omt_tgt the targeted OM tile
361 * @param f furniture you are looking for
362 * @param chance chance of destruction, 0 to 100
363 * @param estimate if true, non-destructive count of the furniture
364 * @param bring_back force the destruction of the furniture and bring back the drop items

477static bool update_time_left( std::string &entry, const comp_list &npc_list )
478{
479 bool avail = false;
480 for( auto &comp : npc_list ) {
481 if( comp->companion_mission_time_ret < calendar:: turn ) {
482 entry = entry + _( " [DONE]\n" );
483 avail = true;
484 } else {
485 entry = entry + " [" +
486 to_string( comp->companion_mission_time_ret - calendar::turn ) +
487 _( " left]\n" );
488 avail = g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
489 }
490 }
491 entry = entry + _( "\n\nDo you wish to bring your allies back into your party?" );
492 return avail;
493}
494
495static bool update_time_fixed( std::string &entry, const comp_list &npc_list,
496 const time_duration &duration )
497{
498 bool avail = false;
499 for( auto &comp : npc_list ) {
500 time_duration elapsed = calendar::turn - comp->companion_mission_time;
501 entry = entry + " " + comp->name + " [" + to_string( elapsed ) + "/" +
502 to_string( duration ) + "]\n";
503 avail |= elapsed >= duration;
504 }
505 entry = entry + _( "\n\nDo you wish to bring your allies back into your party?" );
506 return avail;
507}
508
509static cata::optional<basecamp *> get_basecamp( npc &p, const std::string &camp_type = "default" )
510{
511
512 tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
513 cata::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
514 if( bcp ) {
515 return bcp;
516 }
517 g->m.add_camp( omt_pos, "faction_camp" );
518 bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
519 if( !bcp ) {
520 return cata::nullopt;
521 }
522 basecamp *temp_camp = *bcp;
523 temp_camp->define_camp( omt_pos, camp_type );
524 return temp_camp;
525}
526
527recipe_id base_camps::select_camp_option( const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &pos_options,
528 const std::string &option )
529{
530 std::vector<recipe_id> pos_name_ids;
531 std::vector<std::string> pos_names;
532 for( const auto &it : pos_options ) {
533 pos_names.push_back( it.second.translated() );
534 pos_name_ids.push_back( it.first );
535 }
536
537 if( pos_name_ids.size() == 1 ) {
538 return pos_name_ids.front();
539 }
540
541 const int choice = uilist( _( option ), pos_names );
542 if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= pos_name_ids.size() ) {
543 popup( _( "You choose to wait…" ) );
544 return recipe_id::NULL_ID();
545 }
546 return pos_name_ids[choice];
547}
548
549void talk_function::start_camp( npc &p )
550{
551 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
552 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_pos );
553
554 const auto &pos_camps = recipe_group::get_recipes_by_id( "all_faction_base_types",
555 omt_ref.id().c_str() );
556 if( pos_camps.empty() ) {
557 popup( _( "You cannot build a camp here." ) );
558 return;
559 }
560 const recipe_id camp_type = base_camps::select_camp_option( pos_camps,
561 _( "Select a camp type:" ) );
562 if( !camp_type ) {
563 return;
564 }
565
566 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> om_region =
567 om_building_region( omt_pos, 1 );
568 int near_fields = 0;
569 for( const auto &om_near : om_region ) {
570 const oter_id &om_type = oter_id( om_near.first );
571 if( is_ot_match( "field", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
572 near_fields += 1;
573 }
574 }
575 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> om_region_ext =
576 om_building_region( omt_pos, 3 );
577 int forests = 0;
578 int waters = 0;
579 for( const auto &om_near : om_region_ext ) {
580 const oter_id &om_type = oter_id( om_near.first );
581 if( is_ot_match( "faction_base", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
582 popup( _( "You are too close to another camp!" ) );
583 return;
584 } else if( is_ot_match( "forest", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
585 forests++;
586 } else if( is_ot_match( "river", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
587 waters++;
588 }
589 }
590 bool display = false;
591 std::string buffer = _( "Warning, you have selected a region with the following issues:\n\n" );
592 if( forests < 3 ) {
593 display = true;
594 buffer += _( "There are few forests. Wood is your primary construction material.\n" );
595 }
596 if( waters == 0 ) {
597 display = true;
598 buffer += _( "There are few large clean-ish water sources.\n" );
599 }
600 if( near_fields < 4 ) {
601 display = true;
602 buffer += _( "There are few fields. Farming may be difficult.\n" );
603 }
604 if( display && !query_yn( _( "%s\nAre you sure you wish to continue?" ), buffer ) ) {
605 return;
606 }
607 const recipe &making = camp_type.obj();
608 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( making.get_blueprint(), omt_pos ) ) {
609 popup( _( "%s failed to start the %s basecamp, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
610 p.disp_name(), making.get_blueprint() );
611 return;
612 }
613 get_basecamp( p, camp_type.str() );
614}
615
616void talk_function::recover_camp( npc &p )
617{
618 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
619 const std::string &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_pos ).id().c_str();
620 if( omt_ref.find( "faction_base_camp" ) == std::string::npos ) {
621 popup( _( "There is no faction camp here to recover!" ) );
622 return;
623 }
624 get_basecamp( p );
625}
626
627void talk_function::remove_overseer( npc &p )
628{
629 size_t suffix = p.name.find( _( ", Camp Manager" ) );
630 if( suffix != std::string::npos ) {
631 p.name = p.name.substr( 0, suffix );
632 }
633
634 add_msg( _( "%s has abandoned the camp." ), p.name );
635 p.companion_mission_role_id.clear();
636 stop_guard( p );
637}
638
639void talk_function::basecamp_mission( npc &p )
640{
641 const std::string title = _( "Base Missions" );
642 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
643 mission_data mission_key;
644
645 cata::optional<basecamp *> temp_camp = get_basecamp( p );
646 if( !temp_camp ) {
647 return;
648 }
649 basecamp *bcp = *temp_camp;
650 bcp->set_by_radio( g->u.dialogue_by_radio );
651 if( bcp->get_dumping_spot() == tripoint_zero ) {
652 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
653 if( g->m.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
654 mgr.cache_vzones();
655 }
656 tripoint src_loc;
657 const auto abspos = p.global_square_location();
658 if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos, 60 ) ) {
659 const auto &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
660 const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
661 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
662 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
663 src_loc = g->m.getlocal( src );
664 break;
665 }
666 }
667 bcp->set_dumping_spot( g->m.getabs( src_loc ) );
668 }
669 bcp->get_available_missions( mission_key );
670 if( display_and_choose_opts( mission_key, omt_pos, base_camps::id, title ) ) {
671 bcp->handle_mission( mission_key.cur_key.id, mission_key.cur_key.dir );
672 }
673}
674
675void basecamp::add_available_recipes( mission_data &mission_key, const point &dir,
676 const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &craft_recipes )
677{
678 const std::string dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
679 const std::string dir_abbr = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).bracket_abbr.translated();
680 for( const auto &recipe_data : craft_recipes ) {
681 const std::string id = dir_id + recipe_data.first.str();
682 const std::string &title_e = dir_abbr + recipe_data.second;
683 const std::string &entry = craft_description( recipe_data.first );
684 const recipe &recp = recipe_data.first.obj();
685 bool craftable = recp.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
686 _inv, recp.get_component_filter() );
687 mission_key.add_start( id, title_e, dir, entry, craftable );
688 }
689}

1089 add_available_recipes( mission_key, dir, craft_recipes );
1090 } else {
1091 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1092 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1093 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1094 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1095 }
1096 }
1097
1098 if( has_provides( "blacksmith", dir ) ) {
1099 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" + dir_id );
1100 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info =
1101 base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" ];
1102 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1103 add_available_recipes( mission_key, dir, craft_recipes );
1104 } else {
1105 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1106 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1107 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1108 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1109 }
1110 }
1111
1112 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1113 size_t plots = 0;
1114 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_plow_" + dir_id );
1115 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_plow_" ];
1116 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1117 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1118 "Plow any spaces that have reverted to dirt or grass.\n\n" ) +
1119 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plow ) +
1120 _( "\n\n"
1121 "Skill used: fabrication\n"
1122 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1123 "Effects:\n"
1124 "> Restores only the plots created in the last expansion upgrade.\n"
1125 "> Does not damage existing crops.\n\n"
1126 "Risk: None\n"
1127 "Time: 5 Min / Plot\n"
1128 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1129 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id, dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir,
1130 entry, plots > 0 );
1131 } else {
1132 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1133 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1134 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1135 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1136 }
1137 }
1138 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1139 size_t plots = 0;
1140 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_plant_" + dir_id );
1141 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_plant_" ];
1142 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1143 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1144 "Plant designated seeds in the spaces that have already been "
1145 "tilled.\n\n" ) +
1146 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plant ) +
1147 _( "\n\n"
1148 "Skill used: survival\n"
1149 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1150 "Effects:\n"
1151 "> Choose which seed type or all of your seeds.\n"
1152 "> Stops when out of seeds or planting locations.\n"
1153 "> Will plant in ALL dirt mounds in the expansion.\n\n"
1154 "Risk: None\n"
1155 "Time: 1 Min / Plot\n"
1156 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1157 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id,
1158 dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir, entry,
1159 plots > 0 && warm_enough_to_plant( omt_trg ) );
1160 } else {
1161 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1162 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1163 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1164 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1165 }
1166 }
1167 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1168 size_t plots = 0;
1169 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + dir_id );
1170 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_harvest_" ];
1171 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1172 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1173 "Harvest any plants that are ripe and bring the produce back.\n\n" ) +
1174 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::harvest ) +
1175 _( "\n\n"
1176 "Skill used: survival\n"
1177 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1178 "Effects:\n"
1179 "> Will dump all harvesting products onto your location.\n\n"
1180 "Risk: None\n"
1181 "Time: 3 Min / Plot\n"
1182 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1183 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id,
1184 dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir, entry,
1185 plots > 0 );
1186 } else {
1187 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1188 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1189 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1190 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1191 }
1192 }
1193
1194 if( has_provides( "reseeding", dir ) ) {
1195 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" + dir_id );
1196 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info =
1197 base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" ];
1198 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1199 add_available_recipes( mission_key, dir, craft_recipes );
1200 } else {
1201 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1202 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1203 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1204 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1205 }
1206 }
1207}
1208
1209void basecamp::get_available_missions( mission_data &mission_key )
1210{
1211 std::string entry;
1212
1213 const point &base_dir = base_camps::base_dir;
1214 const base_camps::direction_data &base_data = base_camps::all_directions.at( base_dir );
1215 const std::string base_dir_id = base_data.id;
1216 const std::string base_dir_abbr = base_data.bracket_abbr.translated();
1217 reset_camp_resources();
1218 std::string gather_bldg = "null";
1219
1220 // Handling for the central tile
1221 // return legacy workers
1222 comp_list legacy_npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1223 if( !legacy_npc_list.empty() ) {
1224 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_upgrade_camp" ];
1225 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1226 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, legacy_npc_list );
1227 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1228 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1229 }
1230 for( const basecamp_upgrade &upgrade : available_upgrades( base_camps::base_dir ) ) {
1231 gather_bldg = upgrade.bldg;
1232 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_upgrade_camp" ];
1233 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( upgrade.bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1234 if( npc_list.empty() && !upgrade.in_progress ) {
1235 entry = om_upgrade_description( upgrade.bldg );
1236 mission_key.add_start( miss_info.miss_id + upgrade.bldg,
1237 miss_info.desc + " " + upgrade.name, base_camps::base_dir,
1238 entry, upgrade.avail );
1239 } else if( !npc_list.empty() && upgrade.in_progress ) {
1240 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1241 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1242 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id + upgrade.bldg,
1243 miss_info.ret_desc + " " + upgrade.name, base_camps::base_dir,
1244 entry, avail );
1245 }
1246 }
1247
1248 // Missions that belong exclusively to the central tile
1249 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_camp_crafting_" + base_dir_id );
1250 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_crafting_" ];
1251 //This handles all crafting by the base, regardless of level
1252 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1253 std::map<recipe_id, translation> craft_recipes = recipe_deck( base_camps::base_dir );
1254 add_available_recipes( mission_key, base_camps::base_dir, craft_recipes );
1255 } else {
1256 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1257 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1258 mission_key.add_return( base_dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1259 base_dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, base_camps::base_dir, entry,
1260 avail );
1261 }
1262 if( can_expand() ) {
1263 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_camp_expansion" );
1264 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_expansion" ];
1265 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1266 "Your base has become large enough to support an expansion. "
1267 "Expansions open up new opportunities but can be expensive and "
1268 "time consuming. Pick them carefully, only 8 can be built at "
1269 "each camp.\n\n"
1270 "Skill used: N/A\n"
1271 "Effects:\n"
1272 "> Choose any one of the available expansions. Starting with "
1273 "a farm is always a solid choice since food is used to support "
1274 "companion missions and little is needed to get it going. "
1275 "With minimal investment, a mechanic can be useful as a "
1276 "chop-shop to rapidly dismantle large vehicles, and a forge "
1277 "provides the resources to make charcoal.\n\n"
1278 "NOTE: Actions available through expansions are located in "
1279 "separate tabs of the Camp Manager window.\n\n"
1280 "Risk: None\n"
1281 "Time: 3 Hours\n"
1282 "Positions: %d/1\n" ), npc_list.size() );
1283 mission_key.add_start( miss_info.miss_id, miss_info.desc.translated(),
1284 base_camps::base_dir, entry, npc_list.empty() );
1285 if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1286 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1287 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1288 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1289 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1290 }
1291 }
1292
1293 if( !by_radio ) {
1294 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1295 "Distribute food to your follower and fill you larders. "
1296 "Place the food you wish to distribute in the camp food zone. "
1297 "You must have a camp food zone, and a camp storage zone, "
1298 "or you will be prompted to create them using the zone manager.\n"
1299 "Effects:\n"
1300 "> Increases your faction's food supply value which in "
1301 "turn is used to pay laborers for their time\n\n"
1302 "Must have enjoyability >= -6\n"
1303 "Perishable food liquidated at penalty depending on "
1304 "upgrades and rot time:\n"
1305 "> Rotten: 0%%\n"
1306 "> Rots in < 2 days: 60%%\n"
1307 "> Rots in < 5 days: 80%%\n\n"
1308 "Total faction food stock: %d kcal\nor %d day's rations" ),
1309 camp_food_supply(), camp_food_supply( 0, true ) );
1310 mission_key.add( "Distribute Food", _( "Distribute Food" ), entry );
1311 validate_assignees();
1312 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1313 "Assign repeating job duties to NPCs stationed here.\n"
1314 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1315 "Effects:\n"
1316 "\n\nRisk: None\n"
1317 "Time: Ongoing" ) );
1318 mission_key.add( "Assign Jobs", _( "Assign Jobs" ), entry );
1319 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1320 "Assign followers to work at this camp." ) );
1321 mission_key.add( "Assign Workers", _( "Assign Workers" ), entry );
1322 entry = _( "Notes:\nAbandon this camp" );
1323 mission_key.add( "Abandon Camp", _( "Abandon Camp" ), entry );
1324 }
1325 // Missions assigned to the central tile that could be done by an expansion
1326 get_available_missions_by_dir( mission_key, base_camps::base_dir );
1327
1328 // Loop over expansions
1329 for( const point &dir : directions ) {
1330 get_available_missions_by_dir( mission_key, dir );
1331 }
1332
1333 if( !camp_workers.empty() ) {
1334 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_recall" ];
1335 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1336 "Cancel a current mission and force the immediate return of a "
1337 "companion. No work will be done on the mission and all "
1338 "resources used on the mission will be lost.\n\n"
1339 "WARNING: All resources used on the mission will be lost and "
1340 "no work will be done. Only use this mission to recover a "
1341 "companion who cannot otherwise be recovered.\n\n"
1342 "Companions must be on missions for at least 24 hours before "
1343 "emergency recall becomes available." ) );
1344 bool avail = update_time_fixed( entry, camp_workers, 24_hours );
1345 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1346 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1347 }
1348}
1349
1350bool basecamp::handle_mission( const std::string &miss_id,
1351 const cata::optional<point> &opt_miss_dir )
1352{
1353 const point &miss_dir = opt_miss_dir ? *opt_miss_dir : base_camps::base_dir;
1354
1355 if( miss_id == "Distribute Food" ) {
1356 distribute_food();
1357 }
1358
1359 if( miss_id.size() > 12 && miss_id.substr( 0, 12 ) == "Upgrade Camp" ) {
1360 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 12 );
1361 start_upgrade( bldg, base_camps::base_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1362 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally from Upgrading" ) {
1363 upgrade_return( base_camps::base_dir, "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1364 } else if( miss_id.size() > 27 && miss_id.substr( 0, 27 ) == "Recover Ally from Upgrading" ) {
1365 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 27 );
1366 upgrade_return( base_camps::base_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp", bldg );
1367 }
1368
1369 if( miss_id == "Menial Labor" ) {
1370 start_menial_labor();
1371 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Menial Laborer" ) {
1372 menial_return();
1373 }
1374
1375 if( miss_id == "Assign Jobs" ) {
1376 job_assignment_ui();
1377 }
1378 if( miss_id == "Assign Workers" ) {
1379 worker_assignment_ui();
1380 }
1381 if( miss_id == "Abandon Camp" ) {
1382 abandon_camp();
1383 }
1384
1385 if( miss_id == "Expand Base" ) {
1386 start_mission( "_faction_camp_expansion", 3_hours, true,
1387 _( "departs to survey land…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1388 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Surveyor" ) {
1389 survey_return();
1390 }
1391
1392 if( miss_id == "Gather Materials" ) {
1393 start_mission( "_faction_camp_gathering", 3_hours, true,
1394 _( "departs to search for materials…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1395 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally from Gathering" ) {
1396 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_gathering", 3_hours );
1397 }
1398
1399 if( miss_id == "Collect Firewood" ) {
1400 start_mission( "_faction_camp_firewood", 3_hours, true,
1401 _( "departs to search for firewood…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1402 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Firewood Gatherers" ) {
1403 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_firewood", 3_hours );
1404 }
1405
1406 if( miss_id == "Cut Logs" ) {
1407 start_cut_logs();
1408 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Log Cutter" ) {
1409 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working in the woods…" );
1410 mission_return( "_faction_camp_cut_log", 6_hours, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
1411 }
1412
1413 if( miss_id == "Clearcut" ) {
1414 start_clearcut();
1415 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Clearcutter" ) {
1416 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working in the woods…" );
1417 mission_return( "_faction_camp_clearcut", 6_hours, true, msg, "construction", 1 );
1418 }
1419
1420 if( miss_id == "Setup Hide Site" ) {
1421 start_setup_hide_site();
1422 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hide Setup" ) {
1423 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working on the hide site…" );
1424 mission_return( "_faction_camp_hide_site", 3_hours, true, msg, "survival", 3 );
1425 }
1426
1427 if( miss_id == "Relay Hide Site" ) {
1428 start_relay_hide_site();
1429 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hide Transport" ) {
1430 const std::string msg = _( "returns from shuttling gear between the hide site…" );
1431 mission_return( "_faction_camp_hide_trans", 3_hours, true, msg, "survival", 3 );
1432 }
1433
1434 if( miss_id == "Camp Forage" ) {
1435 start_mission( "_faction_camp_foraging", 4_hours, true,
1436 _( "departs to search for edible plants…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1437 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Foragers" ) {
1438 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_foraging", 4_hours );
1439 }
1440 if( miss_id == "Trap Small Game" ) {
1441 start_mission( "_faction_camp_trapping", 6_hours, true,
1442 _( "departs to set traps for small animals…" ), false, {}, skill_traps, 0 );
1443 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Trappers" ) {
1444 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_trapping", 6_hours );
1445 }
1446
1447 if( miss_id == "Hunt Large Animals" ) {
1448 start_mission( "_faction_camp_hunting", 6_hours, true,
1449 _( "departs to hunt for meat…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1450 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hunter" ) {
1451 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_hunting", 6_hours );
1452 }
1453
1454 if( miss_id == "Construct Map Fort" || miss_id == "Construct Trench" ) {
1455 std::string bldg_exp = "faction_wall_level_N_0";
1456 if( miss_id == "Construct Trench" ) {
1457 bldg_exp = "faction_wall_level_N_1";
1458 }
1459 start_fortifications( bldg_exp );
1460 } else if( miss_id == "Finish Map Fort" ) {
1461 fortifications_return();
1462 }
1463
1464 if( miss_id == "Recruit Companions" ) {
1465 start_mission( "_faction_camp_recruit_0", 4_days, true,
1466 _( "departs to search for recruits…" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1467 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Recruiter" ) {
1468 recruit_return( "_faction_camp_recruit_0", recruit_evaluation() );
1469 }
1470
1471 if( miss_id == "Scout Mission" ) {
1472 start_combat_mission( "_faction_camp_scout_0" );
1473 } else if( miss_id == "Combat Patrol" ) {
1474 start_combat_mission( "_faction_camp_combat_0" );
1475 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Scout" ) {
1476 combat_mission_return( "_faction_camp_scout_0" );
1477 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Combat Patrol" ) {
1478 combat_mission_return( "_faction_camp_combat_0" );
1479 }
1480
1481 const std::string base_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( base_camps::base_dir ).id;
1482 const std::string miss_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( miss_dir ).id;
1483 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_trg = omt_pos + miss_dir;
1484
1485 if( miss_id.substr( 0, 18 + miss_dir_id.size() ) == miss_dir_id + " Expansion Upgrade" ) {
1486 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 18 + miss_dir_id.size() );
1487 start_upgrade( bldg, miss_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id );
1488 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally, " + miss_dir_id + " Expansion" ) {
1489 upgrade_return( miss_dir, "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id );
1490 } else {
1491 const std::string search_str = "Recover Ally, " + miss_dir_id + " Expansion";
1492 size_t search_len = search_str.size();
1493 if( miss_id.size() > search_len && miss_id.substr( 0, search_len ) == search_str ) {
1494 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( search_len );
1495 upgrade_return( miss_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id, bldg );
1496 }
1497 }
1498
1499 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "BASE", "_faction_camp_crafting_" );
1500 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "FARM", "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" );
1501 if( miss_id == base_dir_id + " (Finish) Crafting" ) {
1502 const std::string msg = _( "returns to you with something…" );
1503 mission_return( "_faction_camp_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes, true, msg,
1504 "construction", 2 );
1505 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Crafting" ) {
1506 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your farm with something…" );
1507 mission_return( "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes, true, msg,
1508 "construction", 2 );
1509 }
1510
1511 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "COOK", "_faction_exp_kitchen_cooking_" );
1512 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Cooking" ) {
1513 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your kitchen with something…" );
1514 mission_return( "_faction_exp_kitchen_cooking_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes,
1515 true, msg, "cooking", 2 );
1516 }
1517
1518 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "SMITH", "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" );
1519 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Smithing" ) {
1520 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your blacksmith shop with something…" );
1521 mission_return( "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes,
1522 true, msg, "fabrication", 2 );
1523 }
1524 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Plow Fields" ) {
1525 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::plow );
1526 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Plow Fields" ) {
1527 farm_return( "_faction_exp_plow_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::plow );
1528 }
1529
1530 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Plant Fields" ) {
1531 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::plant );
1532 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Plant Fields" ) {
1533 farm_return( "_faction_exp_plant_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::plant );
1534 }
1535
1536 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Harvest Fields" ) {
1537 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::harvest );
1538 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Harvest Fields" ) {
1539 farm_return( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::harvest );
1540 }
1541
1542 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Chop Shop" ) {
1543 start_garage_chop( miss_dir, omt_trg );
1544 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Chop Shop" ) {
1545 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your garage…" );
1546 mission_return( "_faction_exp_chop_shop_" + miss_dir_id, 5_days, true, msg,
1547 "mechanics", 2 );
1548 }
1549
1550 if( miss_id == "Emergency Recall" ) {
1551 emergency_recall();
1552 }
1553
1554 return true;
1555
1556}
1557
1558// camp faction companion mission start functions
1559npc_ptr basecamp::start_mission( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration duration,
1560 bool must_feed, const std::string &desc, bool /*group*/,
1561 const std::vector<item *> &equipment,
1562 const skill_id &skill_tested, int skill_level )
1563{
1564 std::map<skill_id, int> required_skills;
1565 required_skills[ skill_tested ] = skill_level;
1566 return start_mission( miss_id, duration, must_feed, desc, false, equipment, required_skills );
1567}
1568
1569npc_ptr basecamp::start_mission( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration duration,
1570 bool must_feed, const std::string &desc, bool /*group*/,
1571 const std::vector<item *> &equipment,
1572 const std::map<skill_id, int> &required_skills )
1573{
1574 if( must_feed && camp_food_supply() < time_to_food( duration ) ) {
1575 popup( _( "You don't have enough food stored to feed your companion." ) );
1576 return nullptr;
1577 }
1578 npc_ptr comp = talk_function::individual_mission( omt_pos, base_camps::id, desc, miss_id,
1579 false, equipment, required_skills );
1580 if( comp != nullptr ) {
1581 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + duration;
1582 if( must_feed ) {
1583 camp_food_supply( duration );
1584 }
1585 }
1586 return comp;
1587}
1588
1589void basecamp::start_upgrade( const std::string &bldg, const point &dir,
1590 const std::string &key )
1591{
1592 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg ).obj();
1593 //Stop upgrade if you don't have materials
1594 if( making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
1595 _inv, making.get_component_filter() ) ) {
1596 bool must_feed = bldg != "faction_base_camp_1";
1597
1598 basecamp_action_components components( making, 1, *this );
1599 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
1600 return;
1601 }
1602
1603 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() );
1604 npc_ptr comp = nullptr;
1605 if( making.required_skills.empty() ) {
1606 if( making.skill_used.is_valid() ) {
1607 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed,
1608 _( "begins to upgrade the camp…" ), false, {},
1609 making.skill_used, making.difficulty );
1610 } else {
1611 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed,
1612 _( "begins to upgrade the camp…" ), false, {} );
1613 }
1614 } else {
1615 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed, _( "begins to upgrade the camp…" ),
1616 false, {}, making.required_skills );
1617 }
1618 if( comp == nullptr ) {
1619 return;
1620 }
1621 components.consume_components();
1622 update_in_progress( bldg, dir );
1623 } else {
1624 popup( _( "You don't have the materials for the upgrade." ) );
1625 }
1626}
1627
1628void basecamp::abandon_camp()
1629{
1630 validate_assignees();
1631 for( npc_ptr &guy : overmap_buffer.get_companion_mission_npcs( 10 ) ) {
1632 npc_companion_mission c_mission = guy->get_companion_mission();
1633 if( c_mission.role_id != base_camps::id ) {
1634 continue;
1635 }
1636 const std::string return_msg = _( "responds to the emergency recall…" );
1637 finish_return( *guy, false, return_msg, "menial", 0, true );
1638 }
1639 for( npc_ptr &guy : get_npcs_assigned() ) {
1640 talk_function::stop_guard( *guy );
1641 }
1642 overmap_buffer.remove_camp( *this );
1643 g->m.remove_submap_camp( g->m.getlocal( bb_pos ) );
1644 add_msg( m_info, _( "You abandon %s." ), name );
1645}
1646
1647void basecamp::worker_assignment_ui()
1648{
1649 int entries_per_page = 0;
1650 catacurses::window w_followers;
1651
1652 ui_adaptor ui;
1653 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1654 const point term( TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0,
1655 TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0 );
1656
1657 w_followers = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
1658 point( term.y, term.x ) );
1659 entries_per_page = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 4;
1660
1661 ui.position_from_window( w_followers );
1662 } );
1663 ui.mark_resize();
1664
1665 size_t selection = 0;
1666 input_context ctxt( "FACTION MANAGER" );
1667 ctxt.register_updown();
1668 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1669 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1670 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1671 validate_assignees();
1672 g->validate_npc_followers();
1673
1674 std::vector<npc *> followers;
1675 npc *cur_npc = nullptr;
1676
1677 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1678 werase( w_followers );
1679
1680 // entries_per_page * page number
1681 const size_t top_of_page = entries_per_page * ( selection / entries_per_page );
1682
1683 for( int i = 0; i < FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1; i++ ) {
1684 mvwputch( w_followers, point( 45, i ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
1685 }
1686 draw_border( w_followers );
1687 const nc_color col = c_white;
1688 const std::string no_npcs = _( "You have no companions following you." );
1689 if( !followers.empty() ) {
1690 draw_scrollbar( w_followers, selection, entries_per_page, followers.size(),
1691 point( 0, 3 ) );
1692 for( size_t i = top_of_page; i < followers.size(); i++ ) {
1693 const int y = i - top_of_page + 3;
1694 trim_and_print( w_followers, point( 1, y ), 43, selection == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
1695 followers[i]->disp_name() );
1696 }
1697 } else {
1698 mvwprintz( w_followers, point( 1, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1699 }
1700 mvwprintz( w_followers, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 ), c_light_gray,
1701 _( "Press %s to assign this follower to this camp." ), ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) );
1702 wnoutrefresh( w_followers );
1703 } );
1704
1705 while( true ) {
1706 // create a list of npcs stationed at this camp
1707 followers.clear();
1708 for( const character_id &elem : g->get_follower_list() ) {
1709 shared_ptr_fast<npc> npc_to_get = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
1710 if( !npc_to_get || !npc_to_get->is_following() ) {
1711 continue;
1712 }
1713 npc *npc_to_add = npc_to_get.get();
1714 followers.push_back( npc_to_add );
1715 }
1716 cur_npc = nullptr;
1717 if( !followers.empty() ) {
1718 cur_npc = followers[selection];
1719 }
1720
1721 ui_manager::redraw();
1722 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1723 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1724 selection++;
1725 if( selection >= followers.size() ) {
1726 selection = 0;
1727 }
1728 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1729 if( selection == 0 ) {
1730 selection = followers.empty() ? 0 : followers.size() - 1;
1731 } else {
1732 selection--;
1733 }
1734 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1735 if( !followers.empty() && cur_npc ) {
1736 talk_function::assign_camp( *cur_npc );
1737 }
1738 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1739 break;
1740 }
1741 }
1742}

1744void basecamp::job_assignment_ui()
1745{
1746 int entries_per_page = 0;
1747 catacurses::window w_jobs;
1748
1749 ui_adaptor ui;
1750 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1751 const point term( TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0,
1752 TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0 );
1753
1754 w_jobs = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
1755 point( term.y, term.x ) );
1756
1757 entries_per_page = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 4;
1758
1759 ui.position_from_window( w_jobs );
1760 } );
1761 ui.mark_resize();
1762
1763 size_t selection = 0;
1764 input_context ctxt( "FACTION MANAGER" );
1765 ctxt.register_updown();
1766 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1767 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1768 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1769 validate_assignees();
1770
1771 std::vector<npc *> stationed_npcs;
1772 npc *cur_npc = nullptr;
1773
1774 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1775 werase( w_jobs );
1776 const size_t top_of_page = entries_per_page * ( selection / entries_per_page );
1777 for( int i = 0; i < FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1; i++ ) {
1778 mvwputch( w_jobs, point( 45, i ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
1779 }
1780 draw_border( w_jobs );
1781 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 1 ), c_white, _( "Job/Priority" ) );
1782 const nc_color col = c_white;
1783 const std::string no_npcs = _( "There are no npcs stationed here" );
1784 if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
1785 draw_scrollbar( w_jobs, selection, entries_per_page, stationed_npcs.size(),
1786 point( 0, 3 ) );
1787 for( size_t i = top_of_page; i < stationed_npcs.size(); i++ ) {
1788 const int y = i - top_of_page + 3;
1789 trim_and_print( w_jobs, point( 1, y ), 43, selection == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
1790 stationed_npcs[i]->disp_name() );
1791 }
1792 if( selection < stationed_npcs.size() ) {
1793 int start_y = 3;
1794 if( cur_npc ) {
1795 if( cur_npc->has_job() ) {
1796 for( activity_id &elem : cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector() ) {
1797 const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
1798 player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
1799 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_gray, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ),
1800 test_act.get_verb(), std::to_string( priority ) ) );
1801 start_y++;
1802 }
1803 } else {
1804 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_red, _( "No current job." ) );
1805 }
1806 }
1807 } else {
1808 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1809 }
1810 } else {
1811 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1812 }
1813 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 ), c_light_gray,
1814 _( "Press %s to change this workers job priorities." ), ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) );
1815 wnoutrefresh( w_jobs );
1816 } );
1817
1818 while( true ) {
1819 // create a list of npcs stationed at this camp
1820 stationed_npcs.clear();
1821 for( const auto &elem : get_npcs_assigned() ) {
1822 if( elem ) {
1823 stationed_npcs.push_back( elem.get() );
1824 }
1825 }
1826 cur_npc = nullptr;
1827 // entries_per_page * page number
1828 if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
1829 cur_npc = stationed_npcs[selection];
1830 }
1831
1832 ui_manager::redraw();
1833
1834 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1835 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1836 selection++;
1837 if( selection >= stationed_npcs.size() ) {
1838 selection = 0;
1839 }
1840 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1841 if( selection == 0 ) {
1842 selection = stationed_npcs.empty() ? 0 : stationed_npcs.size() - 1;
1843 } else {
1844 selection--;
1845 }
1846 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1847 if( cur_npc ) {
1848 while( true ) {
1849 uilist smenu;
1850 smenu.text = _( "Assign job priority ( 0 to disable )" );
1851 int count = 0;
1852 std::vector<activity_id> job_vec = cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector();
1853 smenu.addentry( count, true, 'C', _( "Clear all priorities" ) );
1854 count++;
1855 for( const activity_id &elem : job_vec ) {
1856 player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
1857 const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
1858 smenu.addentry( count, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ), test_act.get_verb(),
1859 std::to_string( priority ) ) );
1860 count++;
1861 }
1862 smenu.query();
1863 if( smenu.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
1864 break;
1865 } else if( smenu.ret == 0 ) {
1866 cur_npc->job.clear_all_priorities();
1867 } else if( smenu.ret > 0 && smenu.ret <= static_cast<int>( job_vec.size() ) ) {
1868 activity_id sel_job = job_vec[smenu.ret - 1];
1869 player_activity test_act = player_activity( sel_job );
1870 const std::string formatted = string_format( _( "Priority for %s " ), test_act.get_verb() );
1871 const int amount = string_input_popup()
1872 .title( formatted )
1873 .width( 20 )
1874 .only_digits( true )
1875 .query_int();
1876 cur_npc->job.set_task_priority( sel_job, amount );
1877 } else {
1878 break;
1879 }
1880 }
1881 }
1882 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1883 break;
1884 }
1885 }
1886}

1896 return;

1900 comp->assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );

1902}

1904void basecamp::start_cut_logs()
1905{
1906 std::vector<std::string> log_sources = { "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water" };
1907 popup( _( "Forests and swamps are the only valid cutting locations." ) );
1908 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 1, 50, log_sources );
1909 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
1910 standard_npc sample_npc( "Temp" );
1911 sample_npc.set_fake( true );
1912 int tree_est = om_cutdown_trees_est( forest, 50 );
1913 int tree_young_est = om_harvest_ter_est( sample_npc, forest,
1914 ter_id( "t_tree_young" ), 50 );
1915 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
1916 //Very roughly what the player does + 6 hours for prep, clean up, breaks
1917 time_duration chop_time = 6_hours + 1_hours * tree_est + 7_minutes * tree_young_est;
1918 int haul_items = 2 * tree_est + 3 * tree_young_est;
1919 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
1920 2, haul_items );
1921 time_duration work_time = travel_time + chop_time;
1922 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time,
1923 chop_time, travel_time, dist, 2, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
1924 return;
1925 }
1926
1927 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_cut_log", work_time, true,
1928 _( "departs to cut logs…" ), false, {},
1929 skill_fabrication, 2 );
1930 if( comp != nullptr ) {
1931 om_cutdown_trees_logs( forest, 50 );
1932 om_harvest_ter( *comp, forest, ter_id( "t_tree_young" ), 50 );
1933 mass_volume harvest = om_harvest_itm( comp, forest, 95 );
1934 // recalculate trips based on actual load and capacity
1935 travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2,
1936 harvest.count );
1937 work_time = travel_time + chop_time;
1938 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
1939 //If we cleared a forest...
1940 if( om_cutdown_trees_est( forest ) < 5 ) {
1941 const oter_id &omt_trees = overmap_buffer.ter( forest );
1942 //Do this for swamps "forest_wet" if we have a swamp without trees...
1943 if( omt_trees.id() == "forest" || omt_trees.id() == "forest_thick" ) {
1944 overmap_buffer.ter_set( forest, oter_id( "field" ) );
1945 }
1946 }
1947 }
1948 }
1949}

1954 popup( _( "Forests are the only valid cutting locations." ) );
1955 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 1, 50, log_sources );
1956 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
1957 standard_npc sample_npc( "Temp" );

1961 ter_id( "t_tree_young" ), 95 );
1962 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );

1986void basecamp::start_setup_hide_site()
1987{
1988 std::vector<std::string> hide_locations = { "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water",
1989 "field"
1990 };
1991 popup( _( "Forests, swamps, and fields are valid hide site locations." ) );
1992 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 10, 90, hide_locations, true, true,
1993 omt_pos, true );
1994 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
1995 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
1996 inventory tgt_inv = g->u.inv;
1997 std::vector<item *> pos_inv = tgt_inv.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
1998 return !itm.can_revive();
1999 } );
2000 if( !pos_inv.empty() ) {
2001 std::vector<item *> losing_equipment = give_equipment( pos_inv,
2002 _( "Do you wish to give your companion "
2003 "additional items?" ) );
2004 int trips = om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment );
2005 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : losing_equipment.size();
2006 time_duration build_time = 6_hours;
2007 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
2008 2, haulage );
2009 time_duration work_time = travel_time + build_time;
2010 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time,
2011 build_time, travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
2012 return;
2013 }
2014 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_hide_site", work_time, true,
2015 _( "departs to build a hide site…" ), false, {},
2016 skill_survival, 3 );
2017 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2018 trips = om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment, comp );
2019 haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : losing_equipment.size();
2020 work_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2, haulage ) +
2021 build_time;
2022 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
2023 om_set_hide_site( *comp, forest, losing_equipment );
2024 }
2025 } else {
2026 popup( _( "You need equipment to setup a hide site…" ) );
2027 }
2028 }
2029}
2030
2031void basecamp::start_relay_hide_site()
2032{
2033 std::vector<std::string> hide_locations = { "faction_hide_site_0" };
2034 popup( _( "You must select an existing hide site." ) );
2035 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 10, 90, hide_locations, true, true,
2036 omt_pos, true );
2037 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
2038 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2039 inventory tgt_inv = g->u.inv;
2040 std::vector<item *> pos_inv = tgt_inv.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
2041 return !itm.can_revive();
2042 } );
2043 std::vector<item *> losing_equipment;
2044 if( !pos_inv.empty() ) {
2045 losing_equipment = give_equipment( pos_inv,
2046 _( "Do you wish to give your companion "
2047 "additional items?" ) );
2048 }
2049 //Check items in improvised shelters at hide site
2050 tinymap target_bay;
2051 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( forest ), false );
2052 std::vector<item *> hide_inv;
2053 for( item &i : target_bay.i_at( point( 11, 10 ) ) ) {
2054 hide_inv.push_back( &i );
2055 }
2056 std::vector<item *> gaining_equipment;
2057 if( !hide_inv.empty() ) {
2058 gaining_equipment = give_equipment( hide_inv, _( "Bring gear back?" ) );
2059 }
2060 if( !losing_equipment.empty() || !gaining_equipment.empty() ) {
2061 //Only get charged the greater trips since return is free for both
2062 int trips = std::max( om_carry_weight_to_trips( gaining_equipment ),
2063 om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment ) );
2064 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : std::max( gaining_equipment.size(),
2065 losing_equipment.size() );
2066 time_duration build_time = 6_hours;
2067 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
2068 trips, haulage );
2069 time_duration work_time = travel_time + build_time;
2070 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time, build_time,
2071 travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
2072 return;
2073 }
2074
2075 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_hide_trans", work_time, true,
2076 _( "departs for the hide site…" ), false, {},
2077 skill_survival, 3 );
2078 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2079 // recalculate trips based on actual load
2080 trips = std::max( om_carry_weight_to_trips( gaining_equipment, comp ),
2081 om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment, comp ) );
2082 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : std::max( gaining_equipment.size(),
2083 losing_equipment.size() );
2084 work_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, trips,
2085 haulage ) + build_time;
2086 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
2087 om_set_hide_site( *comp, forest, losing_equipment, gaining_equipment );
2088 }
2089 } else {
2090 popup( _( "You need equipment to transport between the hide site…" ) );
2091 }
2092 }
2093}
2094
2095void basecamp::start_fortifications( std::string &bldg_exp )
2096{
2097 std::vector<std::string> allowed_locations = {
2098 "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water", "field"
2099 };
2100 popup( _( "Select a start and end point. Line must be straight. Fields, forests, and "
2101 "swamps are valid fortification locations. In addition to existing fortification "
2102 "constructions." ) );
2103 tripoint_abs_omt start = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations );
2104 popup( _( "Select an end point." ) );
2105 tripoint_abs_omt stop = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations, true, false, start );
2106 if( start != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) &&
2107 stop != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
2108 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg_exp ).obj();
2109 bool change_x = ( start.x() != stop.x() );
2110 bool change_y = ( start.y() != stop.y() );
2111 if( change_x && change_y ) {
2112 popup( "Construction line must be straight!" );
2113 return;
2114 }
2115 if( bldg_exp == "faction_wall_level_N_1" ) {
2116 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2117 int line_count = tmp_line.size();
2118 int yes_count = 0;
2119 for( auto elem : tmp_line ) {
2120 if( std::find( fortifications.begin(), fortifications.end(), elem ) != fortifications.end() ) {
2121 yes_count += 1;
2122 }
2123 }
2124 if( yes_count < line_count ) {
2125 popup( _( "Spiked pits must be built over existing trenches!" ) );
2126 return;
2127 }
2128 }
2129 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> fortify_om;
2130 if( ( change_x && stop.x() < start.x() ) || ( change_y && stop.y() < start.y() ) ) {
2131 //line_to doesn't include the origin point
2132 fortify_om.push_back( stop );
2133 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2134 fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2135 } else {
2136 fortify_om.push_back( start );
2137 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( start, stop );
2138 fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2139 }
2140 int trips = 0;
2141 time_duration build_time = 0_hours;
2142 time_duration travel_time = 0_hours;
2143 int dist = 0;
2144 for( auto fort_om : fortify_om ) {
2145 bool valid = false;
2146 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( fort_om );
2147 for( const std::string &pos_om : allowed_locations ) {
2148 if( omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om ) {
2149 valid = true;
2150 break;
2151 }
2152 }
2153
2154 if( !valid ) {
2155 popup( _( "Invalid terrain in construction path." ) );
2156 return;
2157 }
2158 trips += 2;
2159 build_time += making.batch_duration();
2160 dist += rl_dist( fort_om.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2161 travel_time += companion_travel_time_calc( fort_om, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2 );
2162 }
2163 time_duration total_time = base_camps::to_workdays( travel_time + build_time );
2164 int need_food = time_to_food( total_time );
2165 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( total_time, build_time,
2166 travel_time, dist, trips, need_food ) ) ) {
2167 return;
2168 } else if( !making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( _inv,
2169 making.get_component_filter(), ( fortify_om.size() * 2 ) - 2 ) ) {
2170 popup( _( "You don't have the material to build the fortification." ) );
2171 return;
2172 }
2173
2174 const int batch_size = fortify_om.size() * 2 - 2;
2175 basecamp_action_components components( making, batch_size, *this );
2176 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
2177 return;
2178 }
2179
2180 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_om_fortifications", total_time, true,
2181 _( "begins constructing fortifications…" ), false, {},
2182 making.required_skills );
2183 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2184 components.consume_components();
2185 comp->companion_mission_role_id = bldg_exp;
2186 for( auto pt : fortify_om ) {
2187 comp->companion_mission_points.push_back( pt );
2188 }
2189 }
2190 }
2191}

2193void basecamp::start_combat_mission( const std::string &miss )
2194{
2195 popup( _( "Select checkpoints until you reach maximum range or select the last point again "
2196 "to end." ) );
2197 tripoint_abs_omt start = omt_pos;
2198 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> scout_points = om_companion_path( start, 90, true );
2199 if( scout_points.empty() ) {
2200 return;
2201 }
2202 int dist = scout_points.size();
2203 int trips = 2;
2204 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( scout_points, 0_minutes, trips );
2205 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( 0_hours, 0_hours,
2206 travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( travel_time ) ) ) ) {
2207 return;
2208 }
2209 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( miss, travel_time, true, _( "departs on patrol…" ),
2210 false, {}, skill_survival, 3 );
2211 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2212 comp->companion_mission_points = scout_points;
2213 }
2214}
2215
2216// the structure of this function has driven (at least) two devs insane
2217// recipe_deck returns a map of recipe ids to descriptions
2218// it first checks whether the mission id starts with the correct direction prefix,
2219// and then search for the mission id without direction prefix in the recipes
2220// if there's a match, the player has selected a crafting mission
2221void basecamp::start_crafting( const std::string &cur_id, const point &cur_dir,
2222 const std::string &type, const std::string &miss_id )
2223{
2224 const std::string cur_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( cur_dir ).id;
2225 const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &recipes = recipe_deck( type );
2226 if( cur_id.substr( 0, cur_dir_id.size() ) != cur_dir_id ) {
2227 // not a crafting mission or has the wrong direction
2228 return;
2229 }
2230 const auto it = recipes.find( recipe_id( cur_id.substr( cur_dir_id.size() ) ) );
2231 if( it != recipes.end() ) {
2232 const recipe &making = it->first.obj();
2233
2234 if( !making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
2235 _inv, making.get_component_filter() ) ) {
2236 popup( _( "You don't have the materials to craft that" ) );
2237 return;
2238 }
2239
2240 int batch_size = 1;
2241 string_input_popup popup_input;
2242 int batch_max = recipe_batch_max( making );
2243 const std::string title = string_format( _( "Batch crafting %s [MAX: %d]: " ),
2244 making.result_name(), batch_max );
2245 popup_input.title( title ).edit( batch_size );
2246
2247 if( popup_input.canceled() || batch_size <= 0 ) {
2248 return;
2249 }
2250 if( batch_size > recipe_batch_max( making ) ) {
2251 popup( _( "Your batch is too large!" ) );
2252 return;
2253 }
2254
2255 basecamp_action_components components( making, batch_size, *this );
2256 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
2257 return;
2258 }
2259
2260 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration( batch_size ) );
2261 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( miss_id + cur_dir_id, work_days, true,
2262 _( "begins to work…" ), false, {},
2263 making.required_skills );
2264 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2265 components.consume_components();
2266 for( const item &results : making.create_results( batch_size ) ) {
2267 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( results );
2268 }
2269 }
2270 return;
2271 }
2272}
2273
2274static bool farm_valid_seed( const item &itm )
2275{
2276 return itm.is_seed() && itm.typeId() != itype_marloss_seed && itm.typeId() != itype_fungal_seeds;
2277}
2278
2279static std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_action( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op,
2280 npc_ptr comp = nullptr )
2281{
2282 size_t plots_cnt = 0;
2283 std::string crops;
2284
2285 const auto is_dirtmound = []( const tripoint & pos, tinymap & bay1, tinymap & bay2 ) {
2286 return ( bay1.ter( pos ) == t_dirtmound ) && ( !bay2.has_furn( pos ) );
2287 };
2288 const auto is_unplowed = []( const tripoint & pos, tinymap & farm_map ) {
2289 const ter_id &farm_ter = farm_map.ter( pos );
2290 return farm_ter->has_flag( flag_PLOWABLE );
2291 };
2292
2293 std::set<std::string> plant_names;
2294 std::vector<item *> seed_inv;
2295 if( comp ) {
2296 seed_inv = comp->companion_mission_inv.items_with( farm_valid_seed );
2297 }
2298
2299 //farm_json is what the area should look like according to jsons
2300 tinymap farm_json;
2301 // TODO: fix point types
2302 farm_json.generate( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ).raw(), calendar::turn );
2303 //farm_map is what the area actually looks like
2304 tinymap farm_map;
2305 farm_map.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
2306 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
2307 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
2308 bool done_planting = false;
2309 for( const tripoint &pos : farm_map.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
2310 if( done_planting ) {
2311 break;
2312 }
2313 switch( op ) {
2314 case farm_ops::plow:
2315 //Needs to be plowed to match json
2316 if( is_dirtmound( pos, farm_json, farm_map ) && is_unplowed( pos, farm_map ) ) {
2317 plots_cnt += 1;
2318 if( comp ) {
2319 farm_map.ter_set( pos, t_dirtmound );
2320 }
2321 }
2322 break;
2323 case farm_ops::plant:
2324 if( is_dirtmound( pos, farm_map, farm_map ) ) {
2325 plots_cnt += 1;
2326 if( comp ) {
2327 if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2328 done_planting = true;
2329 break;
2330 }
2331 item *tmp_seed = seed_inv.back();
2332 seed_inv.pop_back();
2333 std::list<item> used_seed;
2334 if( tmp_seed->count_by_charges() ) {
2335 used_seed.push_back( *tmp_seed );
2336 tmp_seed->charges -= 1;
2337 if( tmp_seed->charges > 0 ) {
2338 seed_inv.push_back( tmp_seed );
2339 }
2340 }
2341 used_seed.front().set_age( 0_turns );
2342 farm_map.add_item_or_charges( pos, used_seed.front() );
2343 farm_map.set( pos, t_dirt, f_plant_seed );
2344 }
2345 }
2346 break;
2347 case farm_ops::harvest:
2348 if( farm_map.furn( pos ) == f_plant_harvest ) {
2349 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2350 map_stack items = farm_map.i_at( pos );
2351 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2352 return it.is_seed();
2353 } );
2354 if( seed != items.end() && farm_valid_seed( *seed ) ) {
2355 plots_cnt += 1;
2356 if( comp ) {
2357 int skillLevel = comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2358 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested from a seed
2359 int plant_cnt = rng( skillLevel / 2, skillLevel );
2360 plant_cnt = std::min( std::max( plant_cnt, 1 ), 9 );
2361 int seed_cnt = std::max( 1, rng( plant_cnt / 4, plant_cnt / 2 ) );
2362 for( auto &i : iexamine::get_harvest_items( *seed->type, plant_cnt,
2363 seed_cnt, true ) ) {
2364 g->m.add_item_or_charges( g->u.pos(), i );
2365 }
2366 farm_map.i_clear( pos );
2367 farm_map.furn_set( pos, f_null );
2368 farm_map.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2369 } else {
2370 plant_names.insert( item::nname( itype_id( seed->type->seed->fruit_id ) ) );
2371 }
2372 }
2373 }
2374 break;
2375 default:
2376 // let the callers handle no op argument
2377 break;
2378 }
2379 }
2380 if( comp ) {
2381 farm_map.save();
2382 }
2383
2384 int total_c = 0;
2385 for( const std::string &i : plant_names ) {
2386 if( total_c < 5 ) {
2387 crops += " " + i + "\n";
2388 total_c++;
2389 } else if( total_c == 5 ) {
2390 crops += _( "+ more\n" );
2391 break;
2392 }
2393 }
2394
2395 return std::make_pair( plots_cnt, crops );
2396}
2397
2398void basecamp::start_farm_op( const point &dir, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op )
2399{
2400 const std::string &dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
2401 std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_data = farm_action( omt_tgt, op );
2402 size_t plots_cnt = farm_data.first;
2403 if( !plots_cnt ) {
2404 return;
2405 }
2406
2407 time_duration work = 0_minutes;
2408 switch( op ) {
2409 case farm_ops::harvest:
2410 work += 3_minutes * plots_cnt;
2411 start_mission( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + dir_id, work, true,
2412 _( "begins to harvest the field…" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 1 );
2413 break;
2414 case farm_ops::plant: {
2415 std::vector<item *> seed_inv = _inv.items_with( farm_valid_seed );
2416 if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2417 popup( _( "You have no additional seeds to give your companions…" ) );
2418 return;
2419 }
2420 std::vector<item *> plant_these = give_equipment( seed_inv,
2421 _( "Which seeds do you wish to have planted?" ) );
2422 size_t seed_cnt = 0;
2423 for( item *seeds : plant_these ) {
2424 seed_cnt += seeds->count();
2425 }
2426 size_t plots_seeded = std::min( seed_cnt, plots_cnt );
2427 if( !seed_cnt ) {
2428 return;
2429 }
2430 work += 1_minutes * plots_seeded;
2431 start_mission( "_faction_exp_plant_" + dir_id, work, true,
2432 _( "begins planting the field…" ), false, plant_these,
2433 skill_survival, 1 );
2434 break;
2435 }
2436 case farm_ops::plow:
2437 work += 5_minutes * plots_cnt;
2438 start_mission( "_faction_exp_plow_" + dir_id, work, true,
2439 _( "begins plowing the field…" ), false, {} );
2440 break;
2441 default:
2442 debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no operation" );
2443 }
2444}
2445
2446bool basecamp::start_garage_chop( const point &dir, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt )
2447{
2448 editmap edit;
2449 vehicle *car = edit.mapgen_veh_query( omt_tgt );
2450 if( car == nullptr ) {
2451 return false;
2452 }
2453
2454 if( !query_yn( _( " Chopping this vehicle:\n%s" ), camp_car_description( car ) ) ) {
2455 return false;
2456 }
2457
2458 const std::string dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
2459 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_exp_chop_shop_" + dir_id, 5_days, true,
2460 _( "begins working in the garage…" ), false, {},
2461 skill_mechanics, 2 );
2462 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2463 return false;
2464 }
2465 // FIXME: use ranges, do this sensibly
2466 //Chopping up the car!
2467 int skillLevel = comp->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics );
2468 for( int prt = 0; prt < car->part_count(); prt++ ) {
2469 vehicle_stack contents = car->get_items( prt );
2470 for( auto iter = contents.begin(); iter != contents.end(); ) {
2471 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( *iter );
2472 iter = contents.erase( iter );
2473 }
2474 bool broken = car->part( prt ).is_broken();
2475 bool skill_break = false;
2476 bool skill_destroy = false;
2477
2478 int dice = rng( 1, 20 );
2479 dice += skillLevel - car->part( prt ).info().difficulty;
2480
2481 if( dice >= 20 ) {
2482 skill_break = false;
2483 skill_destroy = false;
2484 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( *comp, skill_mechanics, 1_hours,
2485 car->part( prt ).info().difficulty );
2486 } else if( dice > 15 ) {
2487 skill_break = false;
2488 } else if( dice > 9 ) {
2489 skill_break = true;
2490 skill_destroy = false;
2491 } else {
2492 skill_break = true;
2493 skill_destroy = true;
2494 }
2495
2496 if( !broken && !skill_break ) {
2497 //Higher level garages will salvage liquids from tanks
2498 if( !car->part( prt ).is_battery() ) {
2499 car->part( prt ).ammo_consume( car->part( prt ).ammo_capacity(),
2500 car->global_part_pos3( car->part( prt ) ) );
2501 }
2502 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( car->part( prt ).properties_to_item() );
2503 } else if( !skill_destroy ) {
2504 for( const item &itm : car->part( prt ).pieces_for_broken_part() ) {
2505 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( itm );
2506 }
2507 }
2508 }
2509 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( *comp, skill_mechanics, 5_days, 2 );
2510 edit.mapgen_veh_destroy( omt_tgt, car );
2511 return true;
2512}

2514// camp faction companion mission recovery functions
2515npc_ptr basecamp::companion_choose_return( const std::string &miss_id,
2516 time_duration min_duration )
2517{
2518 return talk_function::companion_choose_return( omt_pos, base_camps::id, miss_id,
2519 calendar::turn - min_duration );
2520}
2521void basecamp::finish_return( npc &comp, const bool fixed_time, const std::string &return_msg,
2522 const std::string &skill, int difficulty, const bool cancel )
2523{
2524 popup( "%s %s", comp.name, return_msg );
2525 // this is the time the mission was expected to take, or did take for fixed time missions
2526 time_duration reserve_time = comp.companion_mission_time_ret - comp.companion_mission_time;
2527 time_duration mission_time = reserve_time;
2528 if( !fixed_time ) {
2529 mission_time = calendar::turn - comp.companion_mission_time;
2530 }
2531 if( !cancel ) {
2532 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, skill, mission_time, difficulty );
2533 }
2534
2535 // companions subtracted food when they started the mission, but didn't mod their hunger for
2536 // that food. so add it back in.
2537 int need_food = time_to_food( mission_time - reserve_time );
2538 if( camp_food_supply() < need_food ) {
2539 popup( _( "Your companion seems disappointed that your pantry is empty…" ) );
2540 }
2541 int avail_food = std::min( need_food, camp_food_supply() ) + time_to_food( reserve_time );
2542 // movng all the logic from talk_function::companion return here instead of polluting
2543 // mission_companion
2544 comp.reset_companion_mission();
2545 comp.companion_mission_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
2546 comp.companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::before_time_starts;
2547 if( !cancel ) {
2548 for( size_t i = 0; i < comp.companion_mission_inv.size(); i++ ) {
2549 for( const auto &it : comp.companion_mission_inv.const_stack( i ) ) {
2550 if( !it.count_by_charges() || it.charges > 0 ) {
2551 place_results( it );
2552 }
2553 }
2554 }
2555 }
2556 comp.companion_mission_inv.clear();
2557 comp.companion_mission_points.clear();
2558 // npc *may* be active, or not if outside the reality bubble
2559 g->reload_npcs();
2560 validate_assignees();
2561
2562 camp_food_supply( -need_food );
2563 comp.mod_stored_kcal( avail_food );
2564 if( has_water() ) {
2565 comp.set_thirst( 0 );
2566 }
2567 comp.set_fatigue( 0 );
2568 comp.set_sleep_deprivation( 0 );
2569}
2570
2571npc_ptr basecamp::mission_return( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration min_duration,
2572 bool fixed_time, const std::string &return_msg,
2573 const std::string &skill, int difficulty )
2574{
2575 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss_id, min_duration );
2576 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2577 finish_return( *comp, fixed_time, return_msg, skill, difficulty );
2578 }
2579 return comp;
2580}

2602
2603bool basecamp::upgrade_return( const point &dir, const std::string &miss,
2604 const std::string &bldg )
2605{
2606 auto e = expansions.find( dir );
2607 if( e == expansions.end() ) {
2608 return false;
2609 }
2610 const tripoint_abs_omt upos = e->second.pos;
2611 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg ).obj();
2612
2613 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() );
2614 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss, work_days );
2615
2616 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2617 return false;
2618 }
2619 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( making.get_blueprint(), upos ) ) {
2620 popup( _( "%s failed to build the %s upgrade, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
2621 comp->disp_name(),
2622 making.get_blueprint() );
2623 return false;
2624 }
2625 update_provides( bldg, e->second );
2626 update_resources( bldg );
2627
2628 const std::string msg = _( "returns from upgrading the camp having earned a bit of "
2629 "experience…" );
2630 finish_return( *comp, false, msg, "construction", making.difficulty );
2631
2632 return true;
2633}

2645
2646bool basecamp::gathering_return( const std::string &task, time_duration min_time )
2647{
2648 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( task, min_time );
2649 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2650 return false;
2651 }
2652
2653 std::string task_description = _( "gathering materials" );
2654 int danger = 20;
2655 int favor = 2;
2656 int threat = 10;
2657 std::string skill_group = "gathering";
2658 int skill = 2 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + comp->per_cur;
2659 int checks_per_cycle = 6;
2660 if( task == "_faction_camp_foraging" ) {
2661 task_description = _( "foraging for edible plants" );
2662 danger = 15;
2663 checks_per_cycle = 12;
2664 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_trapping" ) {
2665 task_description = _( "trapping small animals" );
2666 favor = 1;
2667 danger = 15;
2668 skill_group = "trapping";
2669 skill = 2 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + comp->per_cur;
2670 checks_per_cycle = 4;
2671 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_hunting" ) {
2672 task_description = _( "hunting for meat" );
2673 danger = 10;
2674 favor = 0;
2675 skill_group = "hunting";
2676 skill = 1.5 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_gun ) + comp->per_cur / 2.0;
2677 threat = 12;
2678 checks_per_cycle = 2;
2679 }
2680
2681 time_duration mission_time = calendar::turn - comp->companion_mission_time;
2682 if( one_in( danger ) && !survive_random_encounter( *comp, task_description, favor, threat ) ) {
2683 return false;
2684 }
2685 const std::string msg = string_format( _( "returns from %s carrying supplies and has a bit "
2686 "more experience…" ), task_description );
2687 finish_return( *comp, false, msg, skill_group, 1 );
2688
2689 item_group_id itemlist = item_group_id( "forest" );
2690 if( task == "_faction_camp_firewood" ) {
2691 itemlist = item_group_id( "gathering_faction_base_camp_firewood" );
2692 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_gathering" ) {
2693 itemlist = get_gatherlist();
2694 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_foraging" ) {
2695 switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
2696 case SPRING:
2697 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_spring" );
2698 break;
2699 case SUMMER:
2700 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_summer" );
2701 break;
2702 case AUTUMN:
2703 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_autumn" );
2704 break;
2705 case WINTER:
2706 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_winter" );
2707 break;
2708 default:
2709 debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
2710 }
2711 }
2712 if( task == "_faction_camp_trapping" || task == "_faction_camp_hunting" ) {
2713 hunting_results( skill, task, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 30 );
2714 } else {
2715 search_results( skill, itemlist, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 15 );
2716 }
2717
2718 return true;
2719}
2720
2721void basecamp::fortifications_return()
2722{
2723 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( "_faction_camp_om_fortifications", 3_hours );
2724 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2725 std::string build_n = "faction_wall_level_N_0";
2726 std::string build_e = "faction_wall_level_E_0";
2727 std::string build_s = "faction_wall_level_S_0";
2728 std::string build_w = "faction_wall_level_W_0";
2729 if( comp->companion_mission_role_id == "faction_wall_level_N_1" ) {
2730 build_n = "faction_wall_level_N_1";
2731 build_e = "faction_wall_level_E_1";
2732 build_s = "faction_wall_level_S_1";
2733 build_w = "faction_wall_level_W_1";
2734 }
2735 std::string build_first = build_e;
2736 std::string build_second = build_w;
2737 bool build_dir_NS = comp->companion_mission_points[0].y() !=
2738 comp->companion_mission_points[1].y();
2739 if( build_dir_NS ) {
2740 build_first = build_s;
2741 build_second = build_n;
2742 }
2743 //Add fences
2744 auto build_point = comp->companion_mission_points;
2745 for( size_t pt = 0; pt < build_point.size(); pt++ ) {
2746 //First point is always at top or west since they are built in a line and sorted
2747 if( pt == 0 ) {
2748 run_mapgen_update_func( build_first, build_point[pt] );
2749 } else if( pt == build_point.size() - 1 ) {
2750 run_mapgen_update_func( build_second, build_point[pt] );
2751 } else {
2752 run_mapgen_update_func( build_first, build_point[pt] );
2753 run_mapgen_update_func( build_second, build_point[pt] );
2754 }
2755 if( comp->companion_mission_role_id == "faction_wall_level_N_0" ) {
2756 tripoint_abs_omt fort_point = build_point[pt];
2757 fortifications.push_back( fort_point );
2758 }
2759 }
2760 const std::string msg = _( "returns from constructing fortifications…" );
2761 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
2762 }
2763}
2764
2765void basecamp::recruit_return( const std::string &task, int score )
2766{
2767 const std::string msg = _( "returns from searching for recruits with "
2768 "a bit more experience…" );
2769 npc_ptr comp = mission_return( task, 4_days, true, msg, "recruiting", 2 );
2770 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2771 return;
2772 }
2773
2774 npc_ptr recruit;
2775 //Success of finding an NPC to recruit, based on survival/tracking
2776 int skill = comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2777 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 17 ) {
2778 recruit = make_shared_fast<npc>();
2779 recruit->normalize();
2780 recruit->randomize();
2781 popup( _( "%s encountered %s…" ), comp->name, recruit->name );
2782 } else {
2783 popup( _( "%s didn't find anyone to recruit…" ), comp->name );
2784 return;
2785 }
2786 //Chance of convincing them to come back
2787 skill = ( 100 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_speech ) + score ) / 100;
2788 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 19 ) {
2789 popup( _( "%s convinced %s to hear a recruitment offer from you…" ), comp->name,
2790 recruit->name );
2791 } else {
2792 popup( _( "%s wasn't interested in anything %s had to offer…" ), recruit->name,
2793 comp->name );
2794 return;
2795 }
2796 //Stat window
2797 int rec_m = 0;
2798 int appeal = rng( -5, 3 ) + std::min( skill / 3, 3 );
2799 int food_desire = rng( 0, 5 );
2800 while( rec_m >= 0 ) {
2801 std::string description = _( "NPC Overview:\n\n" );
2802 description += string_format( _( "Name: %s\n\n" ), right_justify( recruit->name, 20 ) );
2803 description += string_format( _( "Strength: %10d\n" ), recruit->str_max );
2804 description += string_format( _( "Dexterity: %10d\n" ), recruit->dex_max );
2805 description += string_format( _( "Intelligence: %10d\n" ), recruit->int_max );
2806 description += string_format( _( "Perception: %10d\n\n" ), recruit->per_max );
2807 description += _( "Top 3 Skills:\n" );
2808
2809 const auto skillslist = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by(
2810 [&]( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
2811 const int level_a = recruit->get_skill_level( a.ident() );
2812 const int level_b = recruit->get_skill_level( b.ident() );
2813 return localized_compare( std::make_pair( -level_a, a.name() ),
2814 std::make_pair( -level_b, b.name() ) );
2815 } );
2816
2817 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[0]->name(), 12 ),
2818 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[0]->ident() ) );
2819 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[1]->name(), 12 ),
2820 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[1]->ident() ) );
2821 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n\n", right_justify( skillslist[2]->name(), 12 ),
2822 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[2]->ident() ) );
2823
2824 description += _( "Asking for:\n" );
2825 description += string_format( _( "> Food: %10d days\n\n" ), food_desire );
2826 description += string_format( _( "Faction Food:%9d days\n\n" ),
2827 camp_food_supply( 0, true ) );
2828 description += string_format( _( "Recruit Chance: %10d%%\n\n" ),
2829 std::min( 100 * ( 10 + appeal ) / 20, 100 ) );
2830 description += _( "Select an option:" );
2831
2832 std::vector<std::string> rec_options;
2833 rec_options.push_back( _( "Increase Food" ) );
2834 rec_options.push_back( _( "Decrease Food" ) );
2835 rec_options.push_back( _( "Make Offer" ) );
2836 rec_options.push_back( _( "Not Interested" ) );
2837
2838 rec_m = uilist( description, rec_options );
2839 if( rec_m < 0 || rec_m == 3 || static_cast<size_t>( rec_m ) >= rec_options.size() ) {
2840 popup( _( "You decide you aren't interested…" ) );
2841 return;
2842 }
2843
2844 if( rec_m == 0 && food_desire + 1 <= camp_food_supply( 0, true ) ) {
2845 food_desire++;
2846 appeal++;
2847 }
2848 if( rec_m == 1 ) {
2849 if( food_desire > 0 ) {
2850 food_desire--;
2851 appeal--;
2852 }
2853 }
2854 if( rec_m == 2 ) {
2855 break;
2856 }
2857 }
2858 // Roll for recruitment
2859 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + appeal >= 10 ) {
2860 popup( _( "%s has been convinced to join!" ), recruit->name );
2861 } else {
2862 popup( _( "%s wasn't interested…" ), recruit->name );
2863 // nullptr;
2864 return;
2865 }
2866 // Time durations always subtract from camp food supply
2867 camp_food_supply( 1_days * food_desire );
2868 recruit->spawn_at_precise( { g->get_levx(), g->get_levy() }, g->u.pos() + point( -4, -4 ) );
2869 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( recruit );
2870 recruit->form_opinion( g->u );
2871 recruit->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
2872 recruit->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC,
2873 recruit->global_omt_location(),
2874 recruit->getID() ) );
2875 talk_function::follow( *recruit );
2876 g->load_npcs();
2877}
2878
2879void basecamp::combat_mission_return( const std::string &miss )
2880{
2881 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss, 3_hours );
2882 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2883 bool patrolling = miss == "_faction_camp_combat_0";
2884 comp_list patrol;
2885 npc_ptr guy = overmap_buffer.find_npc( comp->getID() );
2886 if( guy ) {
2887 patrol.push_back( guy );
2888 }
2889 for( auto pt : comp->companion_mission_points ) {
2890 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( pt );
2891 int swim = comp->get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
2892 if( is_river( omt_ref ) && swim < 2 ) {
2893 if( swim == 0 ) {
2894 popup( _( "Your companion hit a river and didn't know how to swim…" ) );
2895 } else {
2896 popup( _( "Your companion hit a river and didn't know how to swim well "
2897 "enough to cross…" ) );
2898 }
2899 break;
2900 }
2901 comp->death_drops = false;
2902 bool outcome = talk_function::companion_om_combat_check( patrol, pt, patrolling );
2903 comp->death_drops = true;
2904 if( outcome ) {
2905 overmap_buffer.reveal( pt, 2 );
2906 } else if( comp->is_dead() ) {
2907 popup( _( "%s didn't return from patrol…" ), comp->name );
2908 comp->place_corpse( pt );
2909 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, "DEAD NPC" );
2910 overmap_buffer.remove_npc( comp->getID() );
2911 return;
2912 }
2913 }
2914 const std::string msg = _( "returns from patrol…" );
2915 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "combat", 4 );
2916 }
2917}
2918
2919bool basecamp::survey_return()
2920{
2921 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( "_faction_camp_expansion", 3_hours );
2922 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2923 return false;
2924 }
2925
2926 popup( _( "Select a tile up to %d tiles away." ), 1 );
2927 const tripoint_abs_omt where( ui::omap::choose_point() );
2928 if( where == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
2929 return false;
2930 }
2931
2932 int dist = rl_dist( where.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2933 if( dist != 1 ) {
2934 popup( _( "You must select a tile within %d range of the camp" ), 1 );
2935 return false;
2936 }
2937 if( omt_pos.z() != where.z() ) {
2938 popup( _( "Expansions must be on the same level as the camp" ) );
2939 return false;
2940 }
2941 const point dir = talk_function::om_simple_dir( omt_pos, where );
2942 if( expansions.find( dir ) != expansions.end() ) {
2943 popup( _( "You already have an expansion at that location" ) );
2944 return false;
2945 }
2946
2947 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( where );
2948 const auto &pos_expansions = recipe_group::get_recipes_by_id( "all_faction_base_expansions",
2949 omt_ref.id().c_str() );
2950 if( pos_expansions.empty() ) {
2951 popup( _( "You can't build any expansions in a %s." ), omt_ref.id().c_str() );
2952 return false;
2953 }
2954
2955 const recipe_id expansion_type = base_camps::select_camp_option( pos_expansions,
2956 _( "Select an expansion:" ) );
2957
2958 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( expansion_type.str(), where ) ) {
2959 popup( _( "%s failed to add the %s expansion, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
2960 comp->disp_name(),
2961 expansion_type->blueprint_name() );
2962 return false;
2963 }
2964 overmap_buffer.ter_set( where, oter_id( expansion_type.str() ) );
2965 add_expansion( expansion_type.str(), where, dir );
2966 const std::string msg = _( "returns from surveying for the expansion." );
2967 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
2968 return true;
2969}
2970
2971bool basecamp::farm_return( const std::string &task, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op )
2972{
2973 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working your fields…" );
2974 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( task, 15_minutes );
2975 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2976 return false;
2977 }
2978
2979 farm_action( omt_tgt, op, comp );
2980
2981 //Give any seeds the NPC didn't use back to you.
2982 for( size_t i = 0; i < comp->companion_mission_inv.size(); i++ ) {
2983 for( const auto &it : comp->companion_mission_inv.const_stack( i ) ) {
2984 if( it.charges > 0 ) {
2985 g->u.i_add( it );
2986 }
2987 }
2988 }
2989 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "survival", 2 );
2990 return true;
2991}
