2993// window manipulation
2994void talk_function::draw_camp_tabs( const catacurses::window &win,
2995 const base_camps::tab_mode cur_tab,
2996 const std::vector<std::vector<mission_entry>> &entries )
2997{
2998 werase( win );
2999 const int width = getmaxx( win );
3000 mvwhline( win, point( 0, 2 ), LINE_OXOX, width );
3001
3002 std::vector<std::string> tabs( base_camps::all_directions.size() );
3003 for( const auto &direction : base_camps::all_directions ) {
3004 tabs.at( direction.second.tab_order ) = direction.second.tab_title.translated();
3005 }
3006 const int tab_step = 3;
3007 int tab_space = 1;
3008 int tab_x = 0;
3009 for( auto &t : tabs ) {
3010 bool tab_empty = entries[tab_x + 1].empty();
3011 draw_subtab( win, tab_space, t, tab_x == cur_tab, false, tab_empty );
3012 tab_space += tab_step + utf8_width( t );
3013 tab_x++;
3014 }
3015 wnoutrefresh( win );
3016}
3017
3018std::string talk_function::name_mission_tabs(
3019 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, const std::string &role_id,
3020 const std::string &cur_title, base_camps::tab_mode cur_tab )
3021{
3022 if( role_id != base_camps::id ) {
3023 return cur_title;
3024 }
3025 cata::optional<basecamp *> temp_camp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
3026 if( !temp_camp ) {
3027 return cur_title;
3028 }
3029 basecamp *bcp = *temp_camp;
3030 for( const auto &direction : base_camps::all_directions ) {
3031 if( cur_tab == direction.second.tab_order ) {
3032 return bcp->expansion_tab( direction.first );
3033 }
3034 }
3035 return bcp->expansion_tab( base_camps::base_dir );
3036}
3037
3038// recipes and craft support functions
3039int basecamp::recipe_batch_max( const recipe &making ) const
3040{
3041 int max_batch = 0;
3042 const int max_checks = 9;
3043 for( size_t batch_size = 1000; batch_size > 0; batch_size /= 10 ) {
3044 for( int iter = 0; iter < max_checks; iter++ ) {
3045 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration(
3046 max_batch + batch_size ) );
3047 int food_req = time_to_food( work_days );
3048 bool can_make = making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
3049 _inv, making.get_component_filter(), max_batch + batch_size );
3050 if( can_make && camp_food_supply() > food_req ) {
3051 max_batch += batch_size;
3052 } else {
3053 break;
3054 }
3055 }
3056 }
3057 return max_batch;
3058}

3069 }

3125int om_harvest_furn_est( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance )
3126{
3127 return om_harvest_furn( comp, omt_tgt, f, chance, true, false );
3128}
3129int om_harvest_furn_break( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance )
3130{
3131 return om_harvest_furn( comp, omt_tgt, f, chance, false, false );
3132}
3133int om_harvest_furn( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance,
3134 bool estimate, bool bring_back )
3135{
3136 const furn_t &furn_tgt = f.obj();
3137 tinymap target_bay;
3138 target_bay.load( tripoint( omt_tgt.x * 2, omt_tgt.y * 2, omt_tgt.z ), false );
3139 int harvested = 0;
3140 int total = 0;
3141 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z );
3142 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z );
3143 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3144 if( target_bay.furn( p ) == f && x_in_y( chance, 100 ) ) {
3145 total++;
3146 if( estimate ) {
3147 continue;
3148 }
3149 if( bring_back ) {
3150 for( const item &itm : item_group::items_from( furn_tgt.bash.drop_group,
3151 calendar::turn ) ) {
3152 comp.companion_mission_inv.push_back( itm );
3153 }
3154 harvested++;
3155 }
3156 if( bring_back || comp.str_cur > furn_tgt.bash.str_min + rng( -2, 2 ) ) {
3157 target_bay.furn_set( p, furn_tgt.bash.furn_set );
3158 }
3159 }
3160 }
3161 target_bay.save();
3162 if( bring_back ) {
3163 return harvested;
3164 }
3165 return total;
3166}

3198 target_bay.ter_set( p, ter_tgt.bash.ter_set );

3200 }

3215 return om_cutdown_trees( omt_tgt, chance, false, true );
3216}
3217int om_cutdown_trees_trunks( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance )
3218{
3219 return om_cutdown_trees( omt_tgt, chance, false, false );
3220}
3221int om_cutdown_trees( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance, bool estimate,
3222 bool force_cut_trunk )
3223{
3224 tinymap target_bay;
3225 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3226 int harvested = 0;
3227 int total = 0;
3228 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
3229 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
3230 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3231 if( target_bay.ter( p ).obj().has_flag( flag_TREE ) && rng( 0, 100 ) < chance ) {
3232 total++;
3233 if( estimate ) {
3234 continue;
3235 }
3236 tripoint delta{
3237 3 * ( 2 * rng( 0, 1 ) - 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
3238 3 * rng( -1, 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
3239 omt_tgt.z()
3240 };
3241 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( p, p + delta, rng( 1, 8 ) );
3242 for( auto &elem : tree ) {
3243 target_bay.destroy( elem );
3244 target_bay.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
3245 }
3246 target_bay.ter_set( p, t_dirt );
3247 harvested++;
3248 }
3249 }
3250 if( estimate ) {
3251 return total;
3252 }
3253 if( !force_cut_trunk ) {
3254 target_bay.save();
3255 return harvested;
3256 }
3257 // having cut down the trees, cut the trunks into logs
3258 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3259 if( target_bay.ter( p ) == ter_id( "t_trunk" ) ) {
3260 target_bay.ter_set( p, t_dirt );
3261 target_bay.spawn_item( p, itype_log, rng( 2, 3 ), 0, calendar::turn );
3262 harvested++;
3263 }
3264 }
3265 target_bay.save();
3266 return harvested;
3267}
3268
3269mass_volume om_harvest_itm( npc_ptr comp, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance,
3270 bool take )
3271{
3272 tinymap target_bay;
3273 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3274 units::mass harvested_m = 0_gram;
3275 units::volume harvested_v = 0_ml;
3276 units::mass total_m = 0_gram;
3277 units::volume total_v = 0_ml;
3278 int total_num = 0;
3279 int harvested_num = 0;
3280 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
3281 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
3282 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3283 for( const item &i : target_bay.i_at( p ) ) {
3284 total_m += i.weight( true );
3285 total_v += i.volume( true );
3286 total_num += 1;
3287 if( take && x_in_y( chance, 100 ) ) {
3288 if( comp ) {
3289 comp->companion_mission_inv.push_back( i );
3290 }
3291 harvested_m += i.weight( true );
3292 harvested_v += i.volume( true );
3293 harvested_num += 1;
3294 }
3295 }
3296 if( take ) {
3297 target_bay.i_clear( p );
3298 }
3299 }
3300 target_bay.save();
3301 mass_volume results;
3302 if( take ) {
3303 results.wgt = harvested_m;
3304 results.vol = harvested_v;
3305 results.count = harvested_num;
3306 } else {
3307 results.wgt = total_m;
3308 results.vol = total_v;
3309 results.count = total_num;
3310 }
3311 return results;
3312}
3313
3314tripoint_abs_omt om_target_tile( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, int min_range, int range,
3315 const std::vector<std::string> &possible_om_types, bool must_see,
3316 bool popup_notice, const tripoint_abs_omt &source, bool bounce )
3317{
3318 bool errors = false;
3319 if( popup_notice ) {
3320 popup( _( "Select a location between %d and %d tiles away." ), min_range, range );
3321 }
3322
3323 std::vector<std::string> bounce_locations = { "faction_hide_site_0" };
3324
3325 tripoint_abs_omt where;
3326 om_range_mark( omt_pos, range );
3327 om_range_mark( omt_pos, min_range, true, "Y;X: MIN RANGE" );
3328 if( source == tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
3329 where = ui::omap::choose_point();
3330 } else {
3331 where = ui::omap::choose_point( source );
3332 }
3333 om_range_mark( omt_pos, range, false );
3334 om_range_mark( omt_pos, min_range, false, "Y;X: MIN RANGE" );
3335
3336 if( where == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
3337 return tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 );
3338 }
3339 int dist = rl_dist( where.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
3340 if( dist > range || dist < min_range ) {
3341 popup( _( "You must select a target between %d and %d range from the base. Range: %d" ),
3342 min_range, range, dist );
3343 errors = true;
3344 }
3345
3346 tripoint_abs_omt omt_tgt = where;
3347
3348 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_tgt );
3349
3350 if( must_see && !overmap_buffer.seen( omt_tgt ) ) {
3351 errors = true;
3352 popup( _( "You must be able to see the target that you select." ) );
3353 }
3354
3355 if( !errors ) {
3356 for( const std::string &pos_om : bounce_locations ) {
3357 if( bounce && omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om && range > 5 ) {
3358 if( query_yn( _( "Do you want to bounce off this location to extend range?" ) ) ) {
3359 om_line_mark( omt_pos, omt_tgt );
3360 tripoint_abs_omt dest =
3361 om_target_tile( omt_tgt, 2, range * .75, possible_om_types, true, false,
3362 omt_tgt, true );
3363 om_line_mark( omt_pos, omt_tgt, false );
3364 return dest;
3365 }
3366 }
3367 }
3368
3369 if( possible_om_types.empty() ) {
3370 return omt_tgt;
3371 }
3372
3373 for( const std::string &pos_om : possible_om_types ) {
3374 if( omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om ) {
3375 return omt_tgt;
3376 }
3377 }
3378 }
3379
3380 return om_target_tile( omt_pos, min_range, range, possible_om_types );
3381}
3382
3383void om_range_mark( const tripoint_abs_omt &origin, int range, bool add_notes,
3384 const std::string &message )
3385{
3386 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts;
3387 //North Limit
3388 for( int x = origin.x() - range; x < origin.x() + range + 1; x++ ) {
3389 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( x, origin.y() - range, origin.z() ) );
3390 }
3391 //South
3392 for( int x = origin.x() - range; x < origin.x() + range + 1; x++ ) {
3393 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( x, origin.y() + range, origin.z() ) );
3394 }
3395 //West
3396 for( int y = origin.y() - range; y < origin.y() + range + 1; y++ ) {
3397 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( origin.x() - range, y, origin.z() ) );
3398 }
3399 //East
3400 for( int y = origin.y() - range; y < origin.y() + range + 1; y++ ) {
3401 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( origin.x() + range, y, origin.z() ) );
3402 }
3403
3404 for( auto pt : note_pts ) {
3405 if( add_notes ) {
3406 if( !overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) ) {
3407 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, message );
3408 }
3409 } else {
3410 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) && overmap_buffer.note( pt ) == message ) {
3411 overmap_buffer.delete_note( pt );
3412 }
3413 }
3414 }
3415}
3416
3417void om_line_mark( const tripoint_abs_omt &origin, const tripoint_abs_omt &dest, bool add_notes,
3418 const std::string &message )
3419{
3420 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts = line_to( origin, dest );
3421
3422 for( auto pt : note_pts ) {
3423 if( add_notes ) {
3424 if( !overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) ) {
3425 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, message );
3426 }
3427 } else {
3428 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) && overmap_buffer.note( pt ) == message ) {
3429 overmap_buffer.delete_note( pt );
3430 }
3431 }
3432 }
3433}

3438 return miss_info.action.translated();

3441
3442bool om_set_hide_site( npc &comp, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt,
3443 const std::vector<item *> &itms,
3444 const std::vector<item *> &itms_rem )
3445{
3446 tinymap target_bay;
3447 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3448 target_bay.ter_set( point( 11, 10 ), t_improvised_shelter );
3449 for( auto i : itms_rem ) {
3450 comp.companion_mission_inv.add_item( *i );
3451 target_bay.i_rem( point( 11, 10 ), i );
3452 }
3453 for( auto i : itms ) {
3454 target_bay.add_item_or_charges( point( 11, 10 ), *i );
3455 g->u.use_amount( i->typeId(), 1 );
3456 }
3457 target_bay.save();
3458
3459 overmap_buffer.ter_set( omt_tgt, oter_id( "faction_hide_site_0" ) );
3460
3461 overmap_buffer.reveal( omt_tgt.xy(), 3, 0 );
3462 return true;
3463}
3464
3465// path and travel time
3466time_duration companion_travel_time_calc( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos,
3467 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, time_duration work, int trips, int haulage )
3468{
3469 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> journey = line_to( omt_pos, omt_tgt );
3470 return companion_travel_time_calc( journey, work, trips, haulage );
3471}
3472
3473time_duration companion_travel_time_calc( const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> &journey,
3474 time_duration work, int trips, int haulage )
3475{
3476 int one_way = 0;
3477 for( auto &om : journey ) {
3478 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( om );
3479 std::string om_id = omt_ref.id().c_str();
3480 //Player walks 1 om is roughly 30 seconds
3481 if( om_id == "field" ) {
3482 one_way += 30 + 30 * haulage;
3483 } else if( om_id == "forest" ) {
3484 one_way += 40 + 30 * haulage;
3485 } else if( om_id == "forest_thick" ) {
3486 one_way += 50 + 30 * haulage;
3487 } else if( om_id == "forest_water" ) {
3488 one_way += 60 + 30 * haulage;
3489 } else if( is_river( omt_ref ) ) {
3490 // hauling stuff over a river is slow, because you have to portage most items
3491 one_way += 200 + 40 * haulage;
3492 } else {
3493 one_way += 40 + 30 * haulage;
3494 }
3495 }
3496 return work + one_way * trips * 1_seconds;
3497}
3498
3499int om_carry_weight_to_trips( units::mass mass, units::volume volume,
3500 units::mass carry_mass, units::volume carry_volume )
3501{
3502 int trips_m = 1 + mass / carry_mass;
3503 int trips_v = 1 + volume / carry_volume;
3504 // return the number of round trips
3505 return 2 * std::max( trips_m, trips_v );
3506}
3507
3508int om_carry_weight_to_trips( const std::vector<item *> &itms, npc_ptr comp )
3509{
3510 units::mass total_m = 0_gram;
3511 units::volume total_v = 0_ml;
3512 for( auto &i : itms ) {
3513 total_m += i->weight( true );
3514 total_v += i->volume( true );
3515 }
3516 units::mass max_m = comp ? comp->weight_capacity() - comp->weight_carried() : 30_kilogram;
3517 //Assume an additional pack will be carried in addition to normal gear
3518 units::volume sack_v = item( itype_id( "makeshift_sling" ) ).get_storage();
3519 units::volume max_v = comp ? comp->volume_capacity() - comp->volume_carried() : sack_v;
3520 max_v += sack_v;
3521 return om_carry_weight_to_trips( total_m, total_v, max_m, max_v );
3522}
3523
3524std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> om_companion_path( const tripoint_abs_omt &start, int range_start,
3525 bool bounce )
3526{
3527 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> scout_points;
3528 tripoint_abs_omt last = start;
3529 int range = range_start;
3530 int def_range = range_start;
3531 while( range > 3 ) {
3532 tripoint_abs_omt spt = om_target_tile( last, 0, range, {}, false, true, last, false );
3533 if( spt == tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
3534 scout_points.clear();
3535 return scout_points;
3536 }
3537 if( last == spt ) {
3538 break;
3539 }
3540 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts = line_to( last, spt );
3541 scout_points.insert( scout_points.end(), note_pts.begin(), note_pts.end() );
3542 om_line_mark( last, spt );
3543 range -= rl_dist( spt.xy(), last.xy() );
3544 last = spt;
3545
3546 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( last );
3547
3548 if( bounce && omt_ref.id() == "faction_hide_site_0" ) {
3549 range = def_range * .75;
3550 def_range = range;
3551 }
3552 }
3553 for( auto pt : scout_points ) {
3554 om_line_mark( pt, pt, false );
3555 }
3556 return scout_points;
3557}
3558
3559// camp utility functions
3560// mission support functions
3561std::vector<item *> basecamp::give_equipment( std::vector<item *> equipment,
3562 const std::string &msg )
3563{
3564 std::vector<item *> equipment_lost;
3565 do {
3566 std::vector<std::string> names;
3567 names.reserve( equipment.size() );
3568 for( auto &i : equipment ) {
3569 names.push_back( i->tname() + " [" + std::to_string( i->charges ) + "]" );
3570 }
3571
3572 // Choose item if applicable
3573 const int i_index = uilist( msg, names );
3574 if( i_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( i_index ) >= equipment.size() ) {
3575 return equipment_lost;
3576 }
3577 equipment_lost.push_back( equipment[i_index] );
3578 equipment.erase( equipment.begin() + i_index );
3579 } while( !equipment.empty() );
3580 return equipment_lost;
3581}
3582
3583bool basecamp::validate_sort_points()
3584{
3585 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3586 if( g->m.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
3587 mgr.cache_vzones();
3588 }
3589 tripoint src_loc = g->m.getlocal( bb_pos ) + point_north;
3590 const tripoint abspos = g->m.getabs( g->u.pos() );
3591 if( !mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos, 60 ) ||
3592 !mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_food, abspos, 60 ) ) {
3593 if( query_yn( _( "You do not have sufficient sort zones. Do you want to add them?" ) ) ) {
3594 return set_sort_points();
3595 } else {
3596 return false;
3597 }
3598 } else {
3599 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
3600 const std::vector<tripoint> &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
3601 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
3602 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
3603 src_loc = g->m.getlocal( src );
3604 break;
3605 }
3606 }
3607 set_dumping_spot( g->m.getabs( src_loc ) );
3608 return true;
3609}
3610
3611bool basecamp::set_sort_points()
3612{
3613 popup( _( "Sorting zones have changed. Please create some sorting zones. "
3614 "You must create a camp food zone, and a camp storage zone." ) );
3615 g->zones_manager();
3616 return validate_sort_points();
3617}

3620std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> talk_function::om_building_region(
3621 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, int range, bool purge )
3622{

3626 std::string om_rnear_id = omt_rnear.id().c_str();
3627 if( !purge || ( om_rnear_id.find( "faction_base_" ) != std::string::npos &&
3628 om_rnear_id.find( "faction_base_camp" ) == std::string::npos ) ) {
3629 om_camp_region.push_back( std::make_pair( om_rnear_id, omt_near_pos ) );
3630 }
3631 }
3632 return om_camp_region;

3642// mission descriptions
3643std::string camp_trip_description( const time_duration &total_time,
3644 const time_duration &working_time,
3645 const time_duration &travel_time, int distance, int trips,
3646 int need_food )
3647{
3648 std::string entry = "\n";
3649 //A square is roughly 3 m
3650 int dist_m = distance * SEEX * 2 * 3;
3651 if( dist_m > 1000 ) {
3652 entry += string_format( _( ">Distance:%15.2f (km)\n" ), dist_m / 1000.0 );
3653 entry += string_format( _( ">One Way: %15d (trips)\n" ), trips );
3654 entry += string_format( _( ">Covered: %15.2f (km)\n" ), dist_m / 1000.0 * trips );
3655 } else {
3656 entry += string_format( _( ">Distance:%15d (m)\n" ), dist_m );
3657 entry += string_format( _( ">One Way: %15d (trips)\n" ), trips );
3658 entry += string_format( _( ">Covered: %15d (m)\n" ), dist_m * trips );
3659 }
3660 entry += string_format( _( ">Travel: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( travel_time ), 23 ) );
3661 entry += string_format( _( ">Working: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( working_time ), 23 ) );
3662 entry += "---- ----\n";
3663 entry += string_format( _( "Total: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( total_time ), 23 ) );
3664 entry += string_format( _( "Food: %15d (kcal)\n\n" ), need_food );
3665 return entry;
3666}
3667
3668std::string basecamp::craft_description( const recipe_id &itm )
3669{
3670 const recipe &making = itm.obj();
3671
3672 std::vector<std::string> component_print_buffer;
3673 int pane = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH;
3674 const requirement_data &req = making.simple_requirements();
3675 auto tools = req.get_folded_tools_list( pane, c_white, _inv, 1 );
3676 auto comps = req.get_folded_components_list( pane, c_white, _inv,
3677 making.get_component_filter(), 1 );
3678
3679 component_print_buffer.insert( component_print_buffer.end(), tools.begin(), tools.end() );
3680 component_print_buffer.insert( component_print_buffer.end(), comps.begin(), comps.end() );
3681
3682 std::string comp;
3683 for( auto &elem : component_print_buffer ) {
3684 comp = comp + elem + "\n";
3685 }
3686 comp = string_format( _( "Skill used: %s\nDifficulty: %d\n%s\nTime: %s\n" ),
3687 making.skill_used.obj().name(), making.difficulty, comp,
3688 to_string( base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() ) ) );
3689 return comp;
3690}
3691
3692int basecamp::recruit_evaluation( int &sbase, int &sexpansions, int &sfaction, int &sbonus ) const
3693{
3694 auto e = expansions.find( base_camps::base_dir );
3695 if( e == expansions.end() ) {
3696 sbase = 0;
3697 sexpansions = 0;
3698 sfaction = 0;
3699 sbonus = 0;
3700 return 0;
3701 }
3702 sbase = e->second.cur_level * 5;
3703 sexpansions = expansions.size() * 2;
3704
3705 //How could we ever starve?
3706 //More than 5 farms at recruiting base
3707 int farm = 0;
3708 for( const point &dir : directions ) {
3709 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
3710 farm++;
3711 }
3712 }
3713 sfaction = std::min( camp_food_supply() / 10000, 10 );
3714 sfaction += std::min( camp_discipline() / 10, 5 );
3715 sfaction += std::min( camp_morale() / 10, 5 );
3716
3717 //Secret or Hidden Bonus
3718 //Please avoid openly discussing so that there is some mystery to the system
3719 sbonus = 0;
3720 if( farm >= 5 ) {
3721 sbonus += 10;
3722 }
3723 //More machine than man
3724 //Bionics count > 10, respect > 75
3725 if( g->u.get_bionics().size() > 10 && camp_discipline() > 75 ) {
3726 sbonus += 10;
3727 }
3728 //Survival of the fittest
3729 if( g->get_kill_tracker().npc_kill_count() > 10 ) {
3730 sbonus += 10;
3731 }
3732 return sbase + sexpansions + sfaction + sbonus;
3733}
3734int basecamp::recruit_evaluation() const
3735{
3736 int sbase;
3737 int sexpansions;
3738 int sfaction;
3739 int sbonus;
3740 return recruit_evaluation( sbase, sexpansions, sfaction, sbonus );
3741}
3742
3743std::string basecamp::recruit_description( int npc_count )
3744{
3745 int sbase;
3746 int sexpansions;
3747 int sfaction;
3748 int sbonus;
3749 int total = recruit_evaluation( sbase, sexpansions, sfaction, sbonus );
3750 std::string desc = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
3751 "Recruiting additional followers is very dangerous and "
3752 "expensive. The outcome is heavily dependent on the "
3753 "skill of the companion you send and the appeal of "
3754 "your base.\n\n"
3755 "Skill used: speech\n"
3756 "Difficulty: 2\n"
3757 "Base Score: +%3d%%\n"
3758 "> Expansion Bonus: +%3d%%\n"
3759 "> Faction Bonus: +%3d%%\n"
3760 "> Special Bonus: +%3d%%\n\n"
3761 "Total: Skill +%3d%%\n\n"
3762 "Risk: High\n"
3763 "Time: 4 Days\n"
3764 "Positions: %d/1\n" ), sbase, sexpansions, sfaction,
3765 sbonus, total, npc_count );
3766 return desc;
3767}
3768
3769std::string basecamp::gathering_description( const std::string &bldg )
3770{
3771 item_group_id itemlist;
3772 if( item_group::group_is_defined( item_group_id( "gathering_" + bldg ) ) ) {
3773 itemlist = item_group_id( "gathering_" + bldg );
3774 } else {
3775 itemlist = item_group_id( "forest" );
3776 }
3777 std::string output;
3778
3779 // Functions like the debug item group tester but only rolls 6 times so the player
3780 // doesn't have perfect knowledge
3781 std::map<std::string, int> itemnames;
3782 for( size_t a = 0; a < 6; a++ ) {
3783 const auto items = item_group::items_from( itemlist, calendar::turn );
3784 for( auto &it : items ) {
3785 itemnames[it.display_name()]++;
3786 }
3787 }
3788 // Invert the map to get sorting!
3789 std::multimap<int, std::string> itemnames2;
3790 for( const auto &e : itemnames ) {
3791 itemnames2.insert( std::pair<int, std::string>( e.second, e.first ) );
3792 }
3793 for( const auto &e : itemnames2 ) {
3794 output = output + "> " + e.second + "\n";
3795 }
3796 return output;
3797}
3798
3799std::string basecamp::farm_description( const tripoint_abs_omt &farm_pos, size_t &plots_count,
3800 farm_ops operation )
3801{
3802 std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_data = farm_action( farm_pos, operation );
3803 std::string entry;
3804 plots_count = farm_data.first;
3805 switch( operation ) {
3806 case farm_ops::harvest:
3807 entry += _( "Harvestable: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n" + farm_data.second;
3808 break;
3809 case farm_ops::plant:
3810 entry += _( "Ready for Planting: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n";
3811 break;
3812 case farm_ops::plow:
3813 entry += _( "Needs Plowing: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n";
3814 break;
3815 default:
3816 debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no operation" );
3817 break;
3818 }
3819 return entry;
3820}

3822std::string camp_car_description( vehicle *car )
3823{
3824 std::string entry = string_format( _( "Name: %s\n" ), right_justify( car->name, 25 ) );
3825 entry += _( "---- Engines ----\n" );
3826 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : car->get_any_parts( "ENGINE" ) ) {
3827 const vehicle_part &pt = vpr.part();
3828 const vpart_info &vp = pt.info();
3829 entry += string_format( _( "Engine: %s\n" ), right_justify( vp.name(), 25 ) );
3830 entry += string_format( _( ">Status: %24d%%\n" ),
3831 static_cast<int>( 100 * pt.health_percent() ) );
3832 entry += string_format( _( ">Fuel: %s\n" ), right_justify( item::nname( vp.fuel_type ), 25 ) );
3833 }
3834 std::map<itype_id, int> fuels = car->fuels_left();
3835 entry += _( "---- Fuel Storage & Battery ----\n" );
3836 for( auto &fuel : fuels ) {
3837 std::string fuel_entry = string_format( "%d/%d", car->fuel_left( fuel.first ),
3838 car->fuel_capacity( fuel.first ) );
3839 entry += string_format( ">%s:%s\n", item( fuel.first ).tname(),
3840 right_justify( fuel_entry, 33 - utf8_width( item( fuel.first ).tname() ) ) );
3841 }
3842 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : car->get_all_parts() ) {
3843 if( vpr.part().is_battery() ) {
3844 const vpart_info &vp = vpr.part().info();
3845 entry += string_format( ">%s:%*d%%\n", vp.name(), 32 - utf8_width( vp.name() ),
3846 static_cast<int>( 100.0 * vpr.part().ammo_remaining() /
3847 vpr.part().ammo_capacity() ) );
3848 }
3849 }
3850 entry += "\n";
3851 entry += _( "Estimated Chop Time: 5 Days\n" );
3852 return entry;
3853}

3855// food supply
3856int camp_food_supply( int change, bool return_days )
3857{
3858 faction *yours = g->u.get_faction();
3859 yours->food_supply += change;
3860 if( yours->food_supply < 0 ) {
3861 yours->likes_u += yours->food_supply / 1250;
3862 yours->respects_u += yours->food_supply / 625;
3863 yours->food_supply = 0;
3864 }
3865 if( return_days ) {
3866 return yours->food_supply / 2500;
3867 }
3868
3869 return yours->food_supply;
3870}
3871
3872int camp_food_supply( time_duration work )
3873{
3874 return camp_food_supply( -time_to_food( work ) );
3875}
3876
3877int time_to_food( time_duration work )
3878{
3879 return 2500 * to_hours<int>( work ) / 24;
3880}

3882// mission support
3883bool basecamp::distribute_food()
3884{
3885 if( !validate_sort_points() ) {
3886 popup( _( "You do not have a camp food zone. Aborting…" ) );
3887 return false;
3888 }
3889
3890 zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3891 if( g->m.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
3892 mgr.cache_vzones();
3893 }
3894 const tripoint abspos = get_dumping_spot();
3895 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> z_food = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_food, abspos, 60 );
3896
3897 bool has_items = false;
3898 for( const tripoint &p_food_stock_abs : z_food ) {
3899 const tripoint p_food_stock = g->m.getlocal( p_food_stock_abs );
3900 if( !g->m.i_at( p_food_stock ).empty() ) {
3901 has_items = true;
3902 break;
3903 }
3904 }
3905 if( !has_items ) {
3906 popup( _( "No items are located at the drop point…" ) );
3907 return false;
3908 }
3909
3910 const double quick_rot_coeff = 0.6 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.1 : 0 );
3911 const double slow_rot_coeff = 0.8 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.05 : 0 );
3912
3913 int total = 0;
3914 std::vector<item> keep_me;
3915 for( const tripoint &p_food_stock_abs : z_food ) {
3916 const tripoint p_food_stock = g->m.getlocal( p_food_stock_abs );
3917 map_stack initial_items = g->m.i_at( p_food_stock );
3918 for( item &i : initial_items ) {
3919 const bool is_contained_food = i.is_container() && i.get_contained().is_food();
3920 const item &innermost_item = is_contained_food ? i.get_contained() : i;
3921
3922 const bool would_npcs_eat = innermost_item.is_food()
3923 && !innermost_item.rotten()
3924 && innermost_item.get_comestible_fun() >= -6;
3925
3926 if( !would_npcs_eat ) {
3927 keep_me.push_back( std::move( i ) );
3928 continue;
3929 }
3930
3931 constexpr time_duration full_calories_threshold = 5_days;
3932 constexpr time_duration slow_rot_threshold = 2_days;
3933 // Containers handle spoilage logic internally.
3934 // so we would get very large time duration for canned or unspoilable foods.
3935 const time_duration rots_in = time_duration::from_turns( i.spoilage_sort_order() );
3936 const double rot_multiplier = ( rots_in >= full_calories_threshold ) ?
3937 1.0 :
3938 ( ( rots_in >= slow_rot_threshold ) ? slow_rot_coeff : quick_rot_coeff );
3939 // Comestible is not null for food.
3940 assert( innermost_item.get_comestible() );
3941
3942 // TODO: Probably better use component based nutrition
3943 // like in `Character::compute_effective_nutrients`.
3944 const int kcal_per_item = innermost_item.get_comestible()->default_nutrition.kcal;
3945 const double kcal_from_current = kcal_per_item * innermost_item.count() * rot_multiplier;
3946
3947 total += static_cast<int>( std::round( kcal_from_current ) );
3948
3949 // Leave empty container.
3950 // TODO: make NPCs leave empty food containers elsewhere?
3951 if( i.is_container() ) {
3952 i.contents.clear_items();
3953 i.on_contents_changed();
3954 keep_me.push_back( std::move( i ) );
3955 }
3956 }
3957 g->m.i_clear( p_food_stock );
3958 for( item &i : keep_me ) {
3959 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p_food_stock, std::move( i ), false );
3960 }
3961 keep_me.clear();
3962 }
3963
3964 popup( _( "You distribute %d kcal worth of food to your companions." ), total );
3965 camp_food_supply( total );
3966 return true;
3967}

3983
3984void basecamp::place_results( item result )
3985{
3986 if( by_radio ) {
3987 tinymap target_bay;
3988 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_pos ), false );
3989 const tripoint &new_spot = target_bay.getlocal( get_dumping_spot() );
3990 target_bay.add_item_or_charges( new_spot, result, true );
3991 apply_camp_ownership( new_spot, 10 );
3992 target_bay.save();
3993 } else {
3994 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3995 if( g->m.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
3996 mgr.cache_vzones();
3997 }
3998 const auto abspos = g->m.getabs( g->u.pos() );
3999 if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos ) ) {
4000 const auto &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
4001 const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
4002 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
4003 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
4004 const auto &src_loc = g->m.getlocal( src );
4005 g->m.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, result, true );
4006 apply_camp_ownership( src_loc, 10 );
4007 break;
4008 }
4009 //or dump them at players feet
4010 } else {
4011 g->m.add_item_or_charges( g->u.pos(), result, true );
4012 apply_camp_ownership( g->u.pos(), 0 );
4013 }
4014 }
4015}
4016
4017void apply_camp_ownership( const tripoint &camp_pos, int radius )
4018{
4019 for( const tripoint &p : g->m.points_in_rectangle( camp_pos + point( -radius, -radius ),
4020 camp_pos + point( radius, radius ) ) ) {
4021 auto items = g->m.i_at( p.xy() );
4022 for( item &elem : items ) {
4023 elem.set_owner( g->u );
4024 }
4025 }
4026}

4028// combat and danger
4029// this entire system is stupid
4030bool survive_random_encounter( npc &comp, std::string &situation, int favor, int threat )
4031{
4032 popup( _( "While %s, a silent specter approaches %s…" ), situation, comp.name );
4033 int skill_1 = comp.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4034 int skill_2 = comp.get_skill_level( skill_speech );
4035 if( skill_1 + favor > rng( 0, 10 ) ) {
4036 popup( _( "%s notices the antlered horror and slips away before it gets too close." ),
4037 comp.name );
4038 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "gathering", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4039 } else if( skill_2 + favor > rng( 0, 10 ) ) {
4040 popup( _( "Another survivor approaches %s asking for directions." ), comp.name );
4041 popup( _( "Fearful that he may be an agent of some hostile faction, "
4042 "%s doesn't mention the camp." ), comp.name );
4043 popup( _( "The two part on friendly terms and the survivor isn't seen again." ) );
4044 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "recruiting", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4045 } else {
4046 popup( _( "%s didn't detect the ambush until it was too late!" ), comp.name );
4047 int skill = comp.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) +
4048 0.5 * comp.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) +
4049 comp.get_skill_level( skill_bashing ) +
4050 comp.get_skill_level( skill_cutting ) +
4051 comp.get_skill_level( skill_stabbing ) +
4052 comp.get_skill_level( skill_unarmed ) + comp.get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
4053 int monsters = rng( 0, threat );
4054 if( skill * rng( 8, 12 ) > ( monsters * rng( 8, 12 ) ) ) {
4055 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4056 popup( _( "The bull moose charged %s from the tree line…" ), comp.name );
4057 popup( _( "Despite being caught off guard %s was able to run away until the "
4058 "moose gave up pursuit." ), comp.name );
4059 } else {
4060 popup( _( "The jabberwock grabbed %s by the arm from behind and "
4061 "began to scream." ), comp.name );
4062 popup( _( "Terrified, %s spun around and delivered a massive kick "
4063 "to the creature's torso…" ), comp.name );
4064 popup( _( "Collapsing into a pile of gore, %s walked away unscathed…" ),
4065 comp.name );
4066 popup( _( "(Sounds like bullshit, you wonder what really happened.)" ) );
4067 }
4068 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "combat", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4069 } else {
4070 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4071 popup( _( "%s turned to find the hideous black eyes of a giant wasp "
4072 "staring back from only a few feet away…" ), comp.name );
4073 popup( _( "The screams were terrifying, there was nothing anyone could do." ) );
4074 } else {
4075 popup( _( "Pieces of %s were found strewn across a few bushes." ), comp.name );
4076 popup( _( "(You wonder if your companions are fit to work on their own…)" ) );
4077 }
4078 overmap_buffer.remove_npc( comp.getID() );
4079 return false;
4080 }
4081 }
4082 return true;
4083}
